SA15arhebt_u:314: [56] yasya hi ya ekadeśas tatra tādrūpyopacāraḥ,

SA15arhebt_u:325_0: ka evaṃ sati guṇa iti ced āha [S. 13a.] [T. 213b.] -- evaṃhi upacāre sati cākṣuṣatvādi

SA15arhebt_u:334: sa tu sādhyadharmīti kuta ity āha -- pratyāsatter nyāyāt /
SA15arhebt_u:342: kadācid[62]vyāptidarśanapūrvake prayoge dṛṣṭāntadharmiṇy api prathamaṃ hetusadbhāvopadarśanāt /
SA15arhebt_u:343: yadi na pratyāsatteḥ sādhyadharmisiddhiḥ pāriśeṣyāt tarhi bhaviṣyati /

SA15arhebt_u:346: tato dharmigrahaṇād vyatiricyamānāt sādhyadharmiṇa eva parigrahaḥ /
SA15arhebt_u:347: tadaṃśena iti ca tacchabdena dharmavacanākṣipto dharmī sambhantsyata iti tatsambhandhanārtham api dharmigrahaṇaṃ nāśaṅkanīyam /

SA15arhebt_u:349: dharmivacanasya tv anyad api prayojanaṃ sambhāvyate /

SA15arhebt_u:352: punar ddharmiṇo [S. 14a.] vacanaṃdṛṣṭāntadharmiṇa eva yo dharmaḥsa hetur iti niyamārthamāśaṅkyeta /

SA15arhebt_u:358: m' ity avadhāraṇena siddhe 'pi hetor vyatireke /

SA15arhebt_u:369: tathā hi -- sādhyadharmeṇa vyāpto 'pi dharmo yadi kvacid dharmiṇy upalabhyeta tadā tatraiva svavyāpakapratītiṃ janayet nānyatra [pratyā]sattiviprakarṣābhyāṃ yathākramam /
SA15arhebt_u:370: anupalabdhas tu kvacid dharmiṇi kathaṃ gamakaḥ? /

SA15arhebt_u:372: yad idam anantaraṃ sāmarthyaṃ samupavarṇitam asmāt sāmarthyād arthasya sādhyadharmiparigrahalakṣaṇasya bhavati pratīti[r pa]ṭudhiyāṃ śrotṝṇām,
SA15arhebt_u:373: kintv aśabdakam arthaṃ svayam anusaratāṃ pratipattigauravaṃ syāt /

SA15arhebt_u:376: {2}pratipattigauravaṃca iti caśabdenaitad āha -- ye paropadeśam ākāṅkṣanti,
SA15arhebt_u:377: tair ayam artho lakṣaṇa[vaca]nād boddhavya iti.[S.15a.]
SA15arhebt_u:378: yathālakṣaṇaṃ pratīter apakṣadharmo na hetur iti kutaḥ? iyam āśaṅkā /
SA15arhebt_u:384: [60] yasya kasyacid dharmiṇo dharmasya hetutvam iti vyāptinyāyaḥ / sa yady abhipretaḥ syāt tadā

SA15arhebt_u:401: ṣaṣṭhīsamāsāc ca pakṣadharma ity atra nānyaḥ samāsaḥ sambhavati /
SA15arhebt_u:402: tathā ca pakṣasyaiva dharma [i]ty evam avadhāraṇāt tadaṃśavyāptir virudhyata iti viruddhalakṣaṇatām udbhāvayann āha -- [T. 215a.] pakṣasya dharmatve tvaṃ(taṃ)
SA15arhebt_u:403: pakṣaṃviśeṣaṇam anyato vyavacchedakam apekṣata iti tadviśeṣaṇāpekṣasya dharmasya anyatra pakṣīkṛtād anyasmin sapakṣe ananuvṛttiḥ /
SA15arhebt_u:404: tathā hi -- yaḥ pakṣeṇa viśeṣyate sa pakṣasyaiva bhavati nānya[sya] /
SA15arhebt_u:405: yathā -- yo devadattasya putraḥ sa tasyaiva putro na yajñadattasyāpi /
SA15arhebt_u:409: tato yadi pakṣadharmo na ta[daṃśe]na vyāptiḥ,
SA15arhebt_u:410: [S. 15b.] atha tadaṃśavyāptir na pakṣadharma iti vyāhataṃ lakṣaṇam iti /
SA15arhebt_u:411: nanu ca tadaṃśavyāptir nāma sādhyadharmasya vyāpakasya tatra hetau sati tadādhāradharmiṇi bhāva eva,
SA15arhebt_u:412: vyāpyasya vā hetos tatraiva vyāpake sādhyadharme saty eva bhāva iti svasādhyāvinābhāvalakṣaṇā vakṣyate /
SA15arhebt_u:413: na cānayā 'vaśyaṃ pakṣīkṛtād anyatra vṛttir ākṣipyate, yato[69]lakṣaṇavyāghāta āśaṅkyeta /
SA15arhebt_u:414: tathā hi -- tatraiva pakṣīkṛte saty eva sādhyadharme hetur varttamānas tadaṃśavyāptiṃ pratipadyata eva /
SA15arhebt_u:415: yaiva cāsya sādhyadharmiṇi svasādhyāvinābhāvitā saiva gamakatve nibandhanaṃ nānyadharmiṇi /
SA15arhebt_u:417: na sapakṣe kvacid bahulaṃ vā sahabhāvamātradarśananibandhanaḥ /
SA15arhebt_u:418: na hi lohalekhyaṃ vajram pārthivatvāt kāṣṭhādivat iti tadanyatra pārthivatvasya [T. 215b.] lohalekhyatā 'vinābhāvo 'pi tathābhāvo bhavati [S. 16a.] /
SA15arhebt_u:419: yadi ca pakṣīkṛtād anyatraiva vyāptir ādarśayitavyeti niyamas tadā satvaṃ(ttvaṃ) kathaṃ kṣaṇikatāṃ
SA15arhebt_u:423: yad api kaiścit jvālādeḥ kṣaṇikatvam abhyupagamyate tad api na pratyakṣataḥ,

SA15arhebt_u:429: sa ca viparyaye bādhakapramāṇavṛttyā sādhyadharmiṇy api sidhyatīti na kiñcid
SA15arhebt_u:431: ata evānyatroktam[71]-- [S. 16b.] yat[72]kvacid[73] dṛṣṭaṃ[74] tasya[75] yatra[76] pratibandhaḥtadvidhaḥ[77] tasya[78] tad[79] gamakaṃtatreti[80] vastugatiḥ iti /

SA15arhebt_u:450: tasmāt tadaṃśavyāptivacanena svasādhyāvinābhāvitvasya pratibandhanibandhanasyānyathā tadayogād[83]abhidhānān nāvaśya[T. 216a.]m anyatra vṛttir ākṣipteti,
SA15arhebt_u:454: yadi sarvasya hetoḥ pakṣīkṛte eva dharmiṇi svasādhyapratibandhaḥ pramāṇato niścetuṃ śakyeta /
SA15arhebt_u:455: [S. 17a.] yathā sattvalakṣaṇasya svabhāvahetoḥ kṣaṇikatāyāṃ sādhyāyāṃ tādātmyaṃ viparyaye bādhakapramāṇavṛttyā /
SA15arhebt_u:459: tasmāt tasyānyatraiva[84][prasiddhir iti tadviśeṣaṇāpekṣasya tatra apekṣaṇāt anya]trānanuvṛtteḥ asādhāraṇatā sambhavamātreṇāśaṅkitā /

SA15arhebt_u:481: dharmaś ca āśritatvād viśeṣaṇaṃ tenāyogo vya]vacchidyate nānyayogas tadaṃśavyāptyā tasya pratipādita[tvena dṛṣṭānte saṃdehābhāvāt /
SA15arhebt_u:483: tacchabdena pakṣaḥ parāmṛśyate na dharmaḥ, dharmasya dharmāsambhavāt /
SA15arhebt_u:484: aṃśaś ca dharmo naikadeśaḥ, pakṣa[śabdena dharmimātravacanāt /
SA15arhebt_u:485: na tadaṃśaḥ tasya ca eka]deśābhāvād iti /

SA15arhebt_u:500: tasya pakṣadharmasya sato vyāptiḥ -- yo vyāpnoti yaś ca vyāpyate [tadubhayadharmatayā[87]pratīteḥ /

SA15arhebt_u:504: {p. 18.1} tenāyam arthaḥ -- yatra dharmiṇi vyāpyam asti tatra sarvvatra bhāva eva[89]vyāpakasya svagato dharmo vyāptiḥ /
SA15arhebt_u:513: vivakṣā vyāptes tadā vyāpyasya vā gamakasya tatraiva vyāpake gamye sati /
SA15arhebt_u:514: yatra dharmiṇi vyāpako 'sti tatraiva bhāvo, na tadabhāve 'pi vyāptir iti /

SA15arhebt_u:530: {p. 19.1} vyāpakadharme vyāptiḥ tādṛśy eva vyāpyadharma iti / tathā cāha -
SA15arhebt_u:532: ādhārādheyavad vṛttis tasya saṃyogivan na tu // iti / [S. 20a.]
SA15arhebt_u:533: tena vyāpako vyāpyo na bhavati vyāpyaś ca [na] vyāpaka iti /

SA15arhebt_u:556: yadi tarhi pakṣadharmas tadaṃśena vyāptaḥ ity etad dhetulakṣaṇaṃ tataḥ pakṣadharmatvaṃ tadaṃśavyāptiś ceti dvirūpo hetuḥ syāt,
SA15arhebt_u:557: anyatra ca trirūpa uktaḥ tat kathaṃ na vyāghātaḥ?

SA15arhebt_u:560: tathā hi -- ya[100]eva yenānvito[101]yan[102]nivṛttau ca nivṛttate sa[103]eva tena[104]vyāpta ucyata iti tadātmakatvād vyāpter vyāptivacanenānvayavyatirekābhidhānam /

SA15arhebt_u:587: pramāṇaphalabhedāc[107]ca anumānataḥ anumānena niścayaḥ iti āha /

SA15arhebt_u:592: [107] bauddhamate na pramityātmakaṃ pramāṇaphalaṃ bhinnaṃ kiñcid asti /

SA15arhebt_u:2389: yataḥ evam uktena prakāreṇa janakājanakāvasthayoḥ bījāder vastubhedaḥ tasmād yo 'nyo 'vasthāviśeṣo yadantaraṃ aṅkurādikāryaprasavaḥ {p. 88.1} sa evāṅkurajananasvabhāvaḥ,

SA15arhebt_u:2396: yatas tatsvabhāvasya bījāder jananaṃ na hetvantarāpekṣam,
SA15arhebt_u:2397: yac cājanakam apekṣate na tasya [S. 91b.] tajjananasvabhāvatvam iti /

SA15arhebt_u:2400: tadā tasyoktena prakāreṇa pratyakṣānumānābhyāṃ bādhyamānatvāt tadātmatā nāstīti kutas tata ekatā bhāvānām?
SA15arhebt_u:2402: yadā tu pratyabhijñāyamānatvāt pūrvāparakālayor ekasvabhāvā bījādaya iti hetutayocyate paraiḥ,
SA15arhebt_u:2404: na ca sa pakṣe kvacid varttata ity āha -- kṣaṇikeṣu bhāveṣu asmābhir iṣyamāṇeṣu ekyābhāvād iti sambandhaḥ /
SA15arhebt_u:2408: [ § 19. tatsvabhāvatvāt ity atra punar api anekāntadoṣoddhāraḥ /]
SA15arhebt_u:2409_0: atha yasyāpi kṣanikā bhāvās tasyāpi bījādīnāṃ [T. 267b.] pratikṣaṇam aikyābhāve 'pi
SA15arhebt_u:2409_1: viśeṣānupalakṣaṇād antyakṣaṇavat sarveṣāṃ janakasvabhāvānām api tadbhāvaṃ prati salilādyapekṣatvāt
SA15arhebt_u:2409_2: tadavastham anaikāntikatvam ity āśaṅkyāha -- aparāparotpatteḥ kṣaṇikair api [S. 92a.] nānekāntaḥ,
SA15arhebt_u:2410: aparebhyo 'parebhyaś ca pratyayebhyaḥ pratikṣaṇam utpatteḥ kṣaṇikānāṃ bhinnaśaktitvād antyakṣaṇavaj janakasvabhāvatāvirahāt kutas tair apy anekāntaḥ syāt?
SA15arhebt_u:2411: na hi kāraṇabhedopadhīyamānajanmanāṃ viśeṣānupalakṣaṇe 'py abhinnasvabhāvatā yuktā,
SA15arhebt_u:2413: tathā ca vakṣyati -- `aparāparapratyayayogena pratikṣaṇaṃ bhinnaśaktayaḥ santanvantaḥ saṃskārā yady api kutaścit sāmyāt samānarūpāḥ pratīyante tathāpi bhinna eva eṣāṃ svabhāvaḥ,
SA15arhebt_u:2414: tena kiñcid eva kasyacit kāraṇam' iti /
SA15arhebt_u:2415_0: yad uktaṃ `tatsvabhāvasya jananāt' ity asyānekāntam udbhāvayann āha paraḥ -- te bījakṣityādayaḥ
SA15arhebt_u:2415_1: antyāḥ ante bhavāḥ pratyekam aṅkurajanane samarthāḥ khaṇḍaśaḥ kāraṇebhyaḥ kāryotpādābhāvād
SA15arhebt_u:2415_2: bhavadbhir iṣyanta iti kinna janayanti pratyekam? /
SA15arhebt_u:2416: tataś caiṣām eka eva kaścid aṅkuraṃ janayati,
SA15arhebt_u:2417: tadanye tu tatsvabhāvā api na janayantīti`tatsvabhāvasya jananāt' ity anekāntaḥ /
SA15arhebt_u:2418: tadvat kuśūlādyavasthā api bījādayo 'ṅkurādijananasvabhāvā api na janayiṣyantīti tair anekāntaḥ [S. 92b.] tadavastha eveti manyateparaḥ/
SA15arhebt_u:2419: atrāha -- iti yad evaṃ tvaṃ manyase /
SA15arhebt_u:2420: pareṇa sāmānyenābhidhānāt sāmānyenaivottaram āha -- {1}janayanty eva [T.268a.] {2}nātra svakāryajanane anyathābhāvaḥ ajanakatvam āśaṅkanīyam /
SA15arhebt_u:2422: yadi hi na janayeyur jananasvabhāvā eva na syuḥ /
SA15arhebt_u:2423: tatsvabhāvāś ceṣyanta ity avaśyaṃ janayanti, tathā ca kuto 'naikāntaḥ? iti bhāvaḥ /
SA15arhebt_u:2424: [ § 20. ekenaiva samarthyena kāryajanane pareṣām anupayogam āśaṅkya taduddhāraḥ /]
SA15arhebt_u:2425_0: pratyekam antyānāṃ janakatve kāryasyaikena jananād apareṣām upayogasya nirviṣayatvād
SA15arhebt_u:2425_1: ajananam eveti manyamāna āha paraḥ -- teṣu antyeṣu sahakāriṣu saha -- yugapat karaṇaśīleṣu
SA15arhebt_u:2427: etat pariharati -- `na vai' naiva bhāvānāṃ bījādīnāṃ kācit prekṣāpūrvakāritā buddhipūrvakāritā,
SA15arhebt_u:2428: yataḥ prekṣāpūrvakāritvāt `ayam asmāsv anyatam eko 'pi samarthaḥ kāryajanane,
SA15arhebt_u:2430: ' ity ālocya apare nivarteran [S. 93a.] {p. 90.1} audāsīnyaṃ[367]bhajamānās tatkāryajanane na vyāpriyeran /
SA15arhebt_u:2431: yasmāt te bījādayo bhāvāḥ nirabhiprāyavyāpārāḥ paryālocanāśūnyavyāpārā ekata utpadyamāne kārye sarva eva vyāpriyante /
SA15arhebt_u:2435: yadi hi vyāpṛtād anya eva vyāpāraḥ [T. 268b.] tadā tata eva kāryotpādād vyāpāravataḥ kārakatvam eva hīyate /
SA15arhebt_u:2436: tasyāsau vyāpāraḥ tatas tasya kārakatvam iti cet /
SA15arhebt_u:2437: nanv evaṃ vyāpāropayogasya kāryānupayogini tatropacārāt[369]pāramārthikam asya kārakatvaṃ hīyeta /
SA15arhebt_u:2444: abhimatenaiva vyāpṛtena tadvyāpārotpādanāt nātiprasaṅgaḥ iti cet /
SA15arhebt_u:2447: yena ca pariśrameṇa vyāpāraṃ janayati tena kāryam eva kin notpādayati? yena vyavadhānam āśrīyate /
SA15arhebt_u:2448: yathā ca svasannidhimātreṇaivāyaṃ vyāpāraṃ janayati na vyāpārāntareṇa,
SA15arhebt_u:2451: tasmād bhāvini kārye prāgbhāva eva kāraṇasya vyāpāraḥ /
SA15arhebt_u:2452: sa ca sarveṣāṃ astīti sarva eva kāryotpattau vyāpriyanta iti vyapadiśyante /
SA15arhebt_u:2453: tad api kāryaṃsarvebhya eva jāyate sarveṣāṃ bhāva eva tadbhāvāt /
SA15arhebt_u:2454: na hi kāryasya kāraṇābhimatabhāva eva bhāvam antareṇāparaṃ janma /
SA15arhebt_u:2455: tathābhāve[378]hi tatraiva kāraṇavyāpārāt kāryakriyaivaiṣāṃ na sambhavet /
SA15arhebt_u:2456: tataś ca satsv api kāraṇeṣu katham asya bhāva upalabdhir vā syāt? /
SA15arhebt_u:2466: tasmāt kāryam evābhūtvā hetubhāve bhavatīti bhāva evāsya[387]tato janmeti sarvebhyas tat jāyate /
SA15arhebt_u:2467_0: nanv ekasyāpi tajjanane sāmarthyāt apareṣāṃ tatra sannidhilakṣaṇo vyāpāro vyartha
SA15arhebt_u:2467_1: eveti na tatrāpareṣāṃ bhāvaḥ saṅgacchata iti ced āha -- svahetoḥ kṣitibījasalilādisāmagrīlakṣaṇasya
SA15arhebt_u:2467_2: pariṇāmaḥ kāryotpādānuguṇaviśeṣavataḥ pratikṣaṇam upadhīyamānātiśayasya kṣaṇāntarasya prasavaḥ,
SA15arhebt_u:2468_0: tataḥ upanidhiḥ kāryadeśe sannidhānaṃ dharmo yeṣāṃ te tathābhavantaḥ kāryadeśe sannidhīyamānāḥ
SA15arhebt_u:2468_1: nopālambham arhanti -- `ekasyāpy etatkāryakaraṇe samarthatvāt kim atra bhavantaḥ sannihitāḥ?
SA15arhebt_u:2471: kutaḥ? tatprakṛte tatprakṛtitvāt iti bhāvapradhāno [S. 94b.] nirddeśaḥ /
SA15arhebt_u:2475: tataś[392]ca pratikṣaṇam upadhīyamānātiśayasyotpādāt kevalānāṃ [T. 269b.] ca tajjananasvabhāvavaikalyāt tadaparapratyayayogajanyasvabhāvatvāt samarthajanakasya hetoḥ /
SA15arhebt_u:2476: etac ca yathāvasaraṃ tatra tatra vyaktīkariṣyati /
SA15arhebt_u:2477: tasmād yatsāmagrījanyasvabhāvo yo bhāvaḥ sa tatraikābhāve 'pi kāraṇavaikalyān na sambhavatīty ekasāmagrījanmanāṃ sahabhāvo niyataḥ /
SA15arhebt_u:2478: sarveṣāṃ teṣāṃ bhāva eva kāryasya bhāvāt sarva eva janayantīti `tatsvabhāvasya jananāt' ity atra nānekāntaḥ iti /
SA15arhebt_u:2479: {p. 92.1} yenābhiprāyeṇa `te 'ntyāḥ samarthāḥ kin na janayanti' ity uktaṃ taṃ prakaṭayann āha -- samarthāḥ ityādi /
SA15arhebt_u:2480: siddhāntavādy api `janayanty eva' iti yadabhiprāyavatoktaṃ tam ādarśayati -- na, tatraiva ityādi /
SA15arhebt_u:2483: idam asamartham' iti pratyakṣānupalambhasādhanābhyām anvayavyatirekābhyāṃ vyavahriyate,
SA15arhebt_u:2485: tau cānvayavyatirekāv ekatraiva kārye dṛśyete nāparāparatreti tasyaivaikasya janane samarthā gamyanta iti nāparāparajananam /
SA15arhebt_u:2486: te tu yadavasthā janayanto dṛśyante -- kiṃ tajjananasvabhāvās tadaiva?
SA15arhebt_u:2487: āhosvit prāg api? ity atra vivādaḥ /
SA15arhebt_u:2488: tatra prāg api tatsvabhāvatve paścād iva prāg api jananaprasaṅga iti pratikṣaṇaṃ bheda ucyata iti /
SA15arhebt_u:2506: [383] avyaktād avyaktam eva rūpaṃ jātaṃ yataḥ
SA15arhebt_u:2518_1: parasparavyāvṛttaḥ svabhāvo yeṣāṃ tebhyaś cakṣurādibhyaḥ sahakāribhyaḥ yugapatkartṛbhyaḥ
SA15arhebt_u:2519: bahūni bhinnasvabhāvāni kāraṇāni kāryaṃ tv ekam abhinnasvabhāvam iti na kāraṇabhedāt kāryabhedaḥsyāt /
SA15arhebt_u:2520: tataś cakṣurādayo na bhinnenātmanaikasya kāryasya janakā eṣṭavyāḥ /
SA15arhebt_u:2521: kintv abhinnam eṣām ekakāryajanakaṃ sāmānyabhūtaṃ rūpam upeyaṃ yenābhinnaṃ kāryaṃ janayanti /
SA15arhebt_u:2522: tac ca samagrāvasthāyām eva tatkāryaṃ janayati na vyagrāvasthāyām /
SA15arhebt_u:2523: na caikaikābhāve tasyābhāvaḥ, sāmānyātmanaḥ [S. 95b.] kadācid abhāvavirodhāt /

SA15arhebt_u:2533: nanu tadavasthāyāṃ pratyekam eva sāmagrīśabdavācyānāṃ jananasvabhāvatvābhyupagamāt pratyekam eva cakṣurādikaṃ kāraṇam /
SA15arhebt_u:2534: [T. 270b.] yady evaṃ ko 'yaṃ niyamo yadanekasmād bhavatā 'nekena bhavitavyam viparyaye bādhakapramāṇābhāvāt,
SA15arhebt_u:2538: tad uktam -- tasyaivaikasya janane samarthāḥnānyasya iti nāparāparajananam iti /
SA15arhebt_u:2540: yato nāsmākaṃ bhavatām iva kāraṇam eva [S. 96a.] kāryātmatām upaiti,
SA15arhebt_u:2542: kintu apūrvam eva keṣucit satsu bhavati /
SA15arhebt_u:2543: tac cānekabhāva eva bhāvāt tatkāryam ucyate tasya kuto
SA15arhebt_u:2545: yat tv abhinnaṃ rūpaṃ janakam ucyate tasyaikasthitāv api bhāvāt tatkāryajananasvabhāvāc ca tataḥ kāryaprasavaprasaṅgaḥ,
SA15arhebt_u:2546: tadanyasannidhau tasya viśeṣābhāvāt tadāpi vā na janayet /
SA15arhebt_u:2547: tasmād yeṣu bhāvābhāvavatsu kāryaṃ bhāvābhāvavad dṛśṭaṃ ta eva viśeṣā janakā iti kuto 'nekāntaḥ? /
SA15arhebt_u:2548: atha sāmagrīṃ kāraṇam āśrityocyate `na kāraṇabhedāt kāryabhedaḥ syād iti',
SA15arhebt_u:2550: {2}yathāsvaṃ yasyāḥ sāmagryāḥ ya ātmīyaḥ svabhāvas tadbhedena tadviśeṣopayogataḥ tasya -- vijñānalakṣaṇasya kāryasya,
SA15arhebt_u:2552: teṣūpayogataḥ [T. 271a.] tadupayogaiḥ bhinnasāmagrīvyāpāraiḥ kāryāḥ ye svabhāvaviśeṣāḥ -- kāryāṇāṃ viśiṣṭāḥ svabhāvāḥ [S. 96b.] teṣām asaṅkarāt paras paravyāvṛttarūpatvāt /
SA15arhebt_u:2553: sāmagrībhedād bhinnarūpataiva kāryāṇām iti kathan na kāraṇabhedād kāryabhedaḥ syāt? /
SA15arhebt_u:2558: bhinnasāmagrījanmanāṃ{p. 94.1} kāryasvabhāvaviśeṣāṇām asāṅkaryād asty eva sāmagrīlakṣaṇakāraṇabhedāt kāryāṇāṃ bheda iti /
SA15arhebt_u:2559: nanu yadā viṣayendriyamanaskārebhyo vijñānasambhavaḥ tadā teṣām upayogaviṣayasyaikatvāt katham asāṅkaryam? /
SA15arhebt_u:2562: kathaṃ tarhi teṣāṃ tajjanakatvam?, yadi tadbhedāt [S. 97a.] na bhidyate kāryam /
SA15arhebt_u:2563: kiṃ nu vai samagrāṇām anyānyakāryajananena janakatvam yatas tadbhāve tan na syāt /
SA15arhebt_u:2564: janakatvaṃ hy eṣāṃ tadbhāva eva kasyacid bhāvāt /
SA15arhebt_u:2565: tatraikasyānekasya vā bhāve teṣām ekānekajanakatvam ucyate /
SA15arhebt_u:2573: nanv ekasyāḥ sāmagryā anekasya bhāve sāmagryantarajanyebhyo bhavatu bhedaḥ,
SA15arhebt_u:2576: tatra yadā cakṣūrūpamanaskārebhyo vijñānajanma tadā cakṣūrūpakṣaṇayor api bhāvād vijñānenābhinnahetujatvāt tayor vijñānātmatā,
SA15arhebt_u:2577: vijñānasya vā tadrūpatā kathaṃ na prasajyeta? / āha ca --
SA15arhebt_u:2586: anyādṛśī ca vijñānader iti tadvailakṣaṇyād eva [S. 97b.] kāryāṇāṃ vailakṣaṇyam /
SA15arhebt_u:2587: syād etat -- sarveṣāṃ anvayavyatirekāv anuvidhīyete tadā cakṣurādikṣaṇair iti kuto 'yaṃ bhedaḥ -- ihopādānabhāve bheda(-bhāveneda)
SA15arhebt_u:2590: tathā hi -- vijñānaṃ manaskārasya bodharūpatām anukaroti, na cakṣurāder jarā(ḍā)dibhāvam /
SA15arhebt_u:2592: niyamena ca vijñānamātrabhāve samanantarapratyayasya vyāpāro na cakṣurādeḥ /
SA15arhebt_u:2599_0: yayā kiñcit kāryaṃ svasantānavyavasthānibandhanaṃ janayanty aparaṃ ca santānāntaravyapadeśanibandhanam
SA15arhebt_u:2599_1: iti tasyā eva sāmagryā avāntaraviśeṣakṛtatvāc cakṣūrūpavijñānakṣaṇānāṃ parasparato
SA15arhebt_u:2608: tasmād yadi `kāraṇabhedāt' kāraṇānekatvāt kāryasya bhedaḥ anekatvaṃ tadā pratibandhābhāvād anekāntaḥ /
SA15arhebt_u:2609: na ca tadabhyupagamyata iti na kācit kṣatiḥ /
SA15arhebt_u:2610: atha sāmagrīlakṣaṇasya kāraṇasya bhedaḥ sāmagryantarād vailakṣaṇyaṃ kāryasyāpi bhedo 'tatkāraṇebhyo bhinnasvabhāvatocyate /
SA15arhebt_u:2611: tadā[402]tasyeha[403]bhāvāt kathaṃ na kāraṇabhedāt kāryabhedaḥ syāt?
SA15arhebt_u:2615: ubhayaṃ[405]caitat kāryeṣu pramāṇaparidṛṣṭam iti darśayann āha -- yathā ityādi /
SA15arhebt_u:2616: mṛtpiṇḍādibhyo hi bhavato ghaṭasya na kāraṇānekatve 'py anekarūpatā /

SA15arhebt_u:2619_1: tadanyajanyebhyo bhinnasvabhāvāni [S. 98b.] yāni kāryāṇi sādhayanti tebhyo vilakṣaṇam
SA15arhebt_u:2620: tathā hi -- kulālādinirapekṣo mṛtpiṇḍaḥ tadanyajanyād vṛkṣāder vilakṣaṇam evopādānabhāvena mṛdātmakaṃ kāryaṃ janayan dṛṣṭaḥ /
SA15arhebt_u:2622: tatkāraṇāhitaviśeṣaś ca kevalamṛtpiṇḍād bhinnasvabhāvatayā tatkāryād apīṣṭakāder vilakṣaṇam eva karoti / evaṃ kulālādikam
SA15arhebt_u:2623: api tadanyopādānasahitaṃ sahakāribhāvena yatkāryam karoti tadvilakṣaṇam eva mṛtpiṇḍasahitaṃ tatkāranāhitaviśeṣaṃ ghaṭātmakaṃ kāryaṃ janayatīti samudāyārthaḥ /
SA15arhebt_u:2624: tatra mṛtpiṇḍād bhinnaḥ svabhāvo ghaṭasya ye tadanyopādānakāraṇatayā mṛtsvabhāvā na bhavanti vṛkṣādayas tebhyo bhavati /
SA15arhebt_u:2625_0: kulālāt mṛtpiṇḍopādānāhitātiśayāt sahakāribhāvenopayujyamānāt tasyaiva ghaṭasya mṛtpiṇḍopādānatayā
SA15arhebt_u:2625_1: mṛdātmanaḥ sataḥ saṃsthānaviśeṣaḥ pṛthubudhnodarādyākāraḥ tadātmatayā tadanyebhyo
SA15arhebt_u:2625_2: yeṣāṃ mṛtpiṇḍas tadanyanimittasahita [S. 99a.] upādānam iṣṭakādīnāṃ tebhyo bhinnaḥ svabhāvo bhavati /
SA15arhebt_u:2627_0: bhinnātmakatayā cakrāder vibhakto vicchinnaḥ svabhāvo bhavati tasmād anu[krā]ntakāraṇatrayajanyo
SA15arhebt_u:2627_1: ghaṭaḥ tadanyasmād ekaikakāryād dvidvikāryāc ca bhinnasvabhāva eva jāyata iti sāmagrībhedād
SA15arhebt_u:2627_2: bhinnānyeva kāryāṇi parasparam asaṅkīrṇasvabhāvāni bhavantīti tadupayogakāryaviśeṣāsaṅkaraḥ[407]siddhaḥ /
SA15arhebt_u:2631: yata [S. 99b.] evaṃ sāmagrībhedād bhinnānyeveṣṭakācakrāvibhaktaghaṭa tadvibhaktaghaṭalakṣaṇāni kāryāṇi bhavanti tat tasmāt evam uktena prakāreṇa
SA15arhebt_u:2632: kulālāt mṛtpiṇḍarahitād anyasāmagryantarbhūtāt na mṛtsvabhāvatā kasyacit kāryasya,
SA15arhebt_u:2642: [407] teṣāṃ kāraṇānām upayogaiḥ vyāpāraiḥ kāryā ye svabhāvaviśeṣaḥ teṣām
SA15arhebt_u:2649_0: tad evaṃ sāmagrībhedād bhedaṃ kārasyodāharaṇe pratipādya sahakāriṇām anekatve 'py
SA15arhebt_u:2649_1: anekātmatāvirahaṃ pratipādayann āha -- na ca tayoḥ mṛtkulālayoḥ sahitayoḥ parasparopādānopakṛtātmanoḥ
SA15arhebt_u:2649_2: yaḥ śaktiviśeṣaḥ pratyayāntarasahitāvasthāto viśiṣṭā yogyatā tadviṣayasya[412]tadanyāvasthāviṣayād
SA15arhebt_u:2649_3: bhede saty api yathā tadanyasmād bhedaḥ,
SA15arhebt_u:2652: tābhyāṃ janito yo viśeṣo mṛtsaṃsthānaviśeṣātmakaḥ sa eva tadanyasāmagrījanyād bhidyata iti bhedo asya /
SA15arhebt_u:2653: kathaṃ punar eta[d] jñāyate `tadanyasmād iva [S. 100a.] svabhāvato 'py asya bhedo nāsti' ity ata āha -- mṛtsaṃsthānayoḥ ityādi /
SA15arhebt_u:2654_0: yadi hi mṛtkulālayoḥ tadavasthābhāvinoḥ śaktiviśeṣaviṣayo mṛtsaṃsthānaviśeṣātmako
SA15arhebt_u:2654_1: bhedas tadanyasmād iva svarūpato bhidyeta tadā mṛtsaṃsthānayor aparasparātmatayā
SA15arhebt_u:2654_2: parasparātmatāviraheṇa kāraṇena saṃsthānaviśeṣeṇa mṛt na pratibhāseta,
SA15arhebt_u:2657: na[413]hi yo yasya svabhāvo na bhavati sa tenātmanā svagrāhiṇi jñāne pratibhāsate,
SA15arhebt_u:2658: rūparasavat; jñānaṃ vā tadrūpavikalārthasāmarthyenotpadyamānaṃ tadrūpam anukartuṃ yuktam,
SA15arhebt_u:2660: tasmāt mṛtsaṃsthānayor ekātmataiveti [T. 274a.] na kāraṇānekatvāt kāryasyānekātmakatā aikāntikī,
SA15arhebt_u:2662: ekarūpatayā teṣāṃ sādhāraṇaikakāryakriyā, bhinnarūpatayā vā sādhāraṇakāryakaraṇam iyeta /
SA15arhebt_u:2664_0: paramārthatas tu tatsāmagryantarggatānāṃ sajātīyasyā 'pi kṣaṇāntarasyārambhāt sāmagryantarāvayavatvena
SA15arhebt_u:2664_1: ca kāryāntarasyāpi yathā ekapratyayajanitaṃ kiñcid ekaṃ nāsti tathā 'nekapratyayajanitam
SA15arhebt_u:2664_2: apīti kāraṇānekatvāt kāryānekatvopagame 'pi na kācit kṣatiḥ /
SA15arhebt_u:2672: nanu ca mṛtsaṃsthānaviśeṣayor ekasvabhāvatve 'pyahrīkādibhiḥ saṅkhyādibhedād bheda iṣyate tat katham anekapratyayajanitasyaikatve etad udāharanām syāt? /
SA15arhebt_u:2673: sarvatraiva hi dravyaparyāyayoḥ saṅkhyāsaṃjñālakṣaṇakāryabhedād bhedo deśakālasvabhāvābhedāc cābheda iṣyate,
SA15arhebt_u:2675: tathā hi -- eko ghaṭaḥ rūpādayo bahava iti saṅkhyābhedaḥ /
SA15arhebt_u:2680: ghaṭenodakāharaṇaṃ kriyate, rūpādibhiḥ punarvasturāga iti kāryabhedaḥ /
SA15arhebt_u:2681: evaṃ sarvatra dravyaparyāyayoḥ saṅkhyādibhir bhedaḥ deśādibhis tv abheda iti mṛtsaṃsthānayoḥ kathañcit bhedāt mṛtkulālābhyāṃ janitasya kāryasyānekatā 'sty eva /
SA15arhebt_u:2684: yat punar ekaṃ tat sahakāriṇām abhinnarūpajanyatayaikakāraṇam eveti na vyabhicāra iti /
SA15arhebt_u:2686: svabhāvato bhedānabhyupagame anyathā[416]bhedāsiddheḥ anekasmād ekakāryotpatter abhādhanāt /
SA15arhebt_u:2687: svabhāvato bhedopagame vā 'parasparātmatayā mṛtsaṃsthānayoḥ saṃsthānamṛtsvabhāvaviśeṣābhyāṃ tayor apratibhāsanaṃ durnnivāram /
SA15arhebt_u:2688: yadi hi svabhāvato na bhedo dharmadharmiṇoḥ, saṅkhyādibhedād api naiva bhedaḥ /
SA15arhebt_u:2689: na hi pararūpāḥ bhidyamānā api saṅkhyādaya ātmabhūtam abhedaṃ bādhituṃ samarthāḥ /
SA15arhebt_u:2690: saṅkhyābhedas tāvad asamarthaḥ, ekasminn api dravye bahutvena vyavahāradarśanāt /
SA15arhebt_u:2692: na ca bahuvacanasya niyamenādarśanād rūpādayo 'tra nimittam,
SA15arhebt_u:2693: rūpādinimittatve hi guruḥ iti na kadācit ekavacanaṃ syāt /
SA15arhebt_u:2694: [S. 101b.] sambhavi dharmirūpamātram abhidheyatvena vivakṣitam iti cet /
SA15arhebt_u:2697: vrīhaya iti ca jātivacane [T. 275a.] dharmiṇo rūpādīnāṃ cānabhidhānāt na kiñcid uttaram /
SA15arhebt_u:2698: ubhayarūpasya ca vastuno guruśabdavācyatvāt kathaṃ sambhavino dharmirūpasyaikatvena vivakṣā? /
SA15arhebt_u:2699: tataś caiko gurur iti sāmānādhikaraṇy adarśanāt paryāyā apy ekasaṃkhyāviṣayāḥ /
SA15arhebt_u:2704: ekasminn api saṃjñābhedadṛṣṭeḥ katham asya bhedanimittatā? /
SA15arhebt_u:2706: atrāpi indanāt śakanāt dāraṇāc ca śaktibhedo gamyata iti cet /
SA15arhebt_u:2709: na hi śaktir eva indati śaknoti dārayati ca /
SA15arhebt_u:2715: yeṣāṃ ca paryāyāṇāṃ na kācid arthānugamamātrā tatra kiṃ vaktavyam? /
SA15arhebt_u:2717: na hy eko bhāvaḥ kvacid apy anvayī siddha iti /
SA15arhebt_u:2718: tathā hi -- na kūṭasthanityatayā nityaṃ {p. 100.1} dravyamahrīkair iṣyate,
SA15arhebt_u:2721: na hy asya paryāyāṇām ivocchedaḥ tadrūpeṇa[418],
SA15arhebt_u:2722: paryāyā [T. 275b.] eva paryāyarūpeṇa nirudhyante na tu dravyam iti nityam abhyupagamyate /
SA15arhebt_u:2726: na punas tat tato vilakṣaṇam upalakṣyate /
SA15arhebt_u:2727: kāryabhedas tv asmān prati asiddha eva /
SA15arhebt_u:2731: tatra pūrvaṃ bhavati bhedanibandhanam yadīha sambhavet /
SA15arhebt_u:2732: tat tu na sambhavati dharmadharmiṇos tulyakālatvāt /
SA15arhebt_u:2733: abhinnakālas tu kāryabhede 'naikāntikaḥ, vibhaktapariṇāmeṣu paṭādiṣu sambhavāt /
SA15arhebt_u:2734: paṭādayo 'pi hi vibhaktapariṇāmā anekaṃ kāryaṃ kurvanto dṛṣṭāḥ /
SA15arhebt_u:2735: na ca dharmirūpeṇa bhidyante, ekasyānekakiyāvirodhābhāvāc ca /
SA15arhebt_u:2736: na hy atra kāraṇam eva kāryātmatām upaiti,
SA15arhebt_u:2737: yata ekasya kāraṇātmanaḥ ekakāryarūpatopagame tadanyarūpābhāvāt tadanyakāryātmatopagatir na syāt /
SA15arhebt_u:2738: kintv apūrvam eva kasyacid bhāve prāgavidyamānaṃ bhavat tatkāryam /
SA15arhebt_u:2744: nanu ca tatsannidhau vijñānalakṣaṇakāryasambhavāt tajjananasvabhāvataivaiṣām avadhriyate,
SA15arhebt_u:2748: tataś ca vijñānam eva na kuryuḥ, tadanyajananasvabhāvatvāt /
SA15arhebt_u:2750: tathā hi -- te tadavasthāyāṃ pratyekaṃ viśiṣṭasajātīyetarakṣāṇajananātmakāḥ,
SA15arhebt_u:2752: tatra vijñānajananasvabhāvataiveti tasyājananasvabhāvatā vyavacchidyate tasyā eva pratiyogitvāt nānyajananasvabhavatā /
SA15arhebt_u:2753: na cātas teṣām anekātmatā syāt, ekasyaivātmātiśayasyānekakāryahetutvāt /
SA15arhebt_u:2754: na hi tadanyāpekṣayā viparyayavyāvṛttim upādāyānekena śabdenābhidhīyamānaṃ vastu anekarūpatāṃ pratipadyate,
SA15arhebt_u:2757: na hy atra svabhāvabhedanibandhanā dhvanayaḥ, sāmānādhikaraṇyābhāvaprasaṅgāt /
SA15arhebt_u:2760: apekṣāyāṃ vā katham ekam aneka[T. 277b.]kāryaṃ na syāt? /
SA15arhebt_u:2763: na ca nīlādīnām ātmabhedam adhyakṣam īkṣāmahe[428]/
SA15arhebt_u:2767: ekasyānekakriyā 'nabhyupagame ca yo 'yaṃ rūparasagandhasparśaviśeṣāṇāṃ kvacit sahabhāvaniyamaḥ pramāṇaparidṛṣṭaḥ sa na syāt /
SA15arhebt_u:2773: anekenaikasvabhāvatāṃ cānubhavataḥ tadvad[431]anekatāyā durnivāratvāt anyathā dharmadharmiṇāṃ kathaṃ {p. 102.1} naikāntiko bhedaḥ? /
SA15arhebt_u:2775: dharmī paryāyāś caite iti vyavasthāpyate, yadi tasya bhedas tadā bheda eveti /
SA15arhebt_u:2777: na hi parasparopādānakṛtopakārānapekṣā viṣayendriyamanaskārāḥ sahaikakāryārambhiṇo yuktāḥ /
SA15arhebt_u:2778: na caikam eva kiñcit kvacit janayati /
SA15arhebt_u:2782: tasmād ekasāmagryadhīnajanmanāmeva sahabhāvaniyamo bhāvānām ekakāryakriyāniyamo vā /
SA15arhebt_u:2783: tataś ca svasantānakṣaṇam itaropādānaṃ[436]ca yugapad upakurvataḥ katham ekasyānekakāryatā na syāt? /
SA15arhebt_u:2785: dravyaparyāyāṇāṃ caikasvabhāvatām ācakṣāṇa [S. 104a.] ekasyānekakāryatāṃ pratikṣipatīti kathaṃ nonmattaḥ[437]?
SA15arhebt_u:2787: ekasvabhāvatve ca dravyaparyāyāṇāṃ tatkāryabheda[439]ekavastunibandhana eveti kāryabhedād bhedam abhidadhānaḥ sphuṭam ahrīka evāyam ity upekṣām arhati /
SA15arhebt_u:2792: [417] śaktyor bhede 'pi tadādhārasyaikyād aupacārikaṃ sāmānādhikaraṇyam ity āśaṅkyāha -- na ca ityādi //
SA15arhebt_u:2797: [422] The order of the Tib. Fol. should be 275, 277, 276 and 278 according to the S. Mss.
SA15arhebt_u:2813: [438] svabhāvasyaiva bhedo vastuna iti ced āha
SA15arhebt_u:2817_0: vaiśeṣiko 'pi dravyasyaikasya dravyaguṇakarmaṇāṃ samavāyikāraṇatāṃ bruvāṇaḥ karmaṇaś
SA15arhebt_u:2818: na cātra śaktibhedo nibandhanam, yatas tadekopakāranirapekṣāḥ katham etāḥ śaktayo niyatārthādhārāḥ?
SA15arhebt_u:2829: deśakālasvabhāvābhedād abhedas tu yo 'bhyupagamyate so 'py anupapanna eva /
SA15arhebt_u:2830: tathā hi -- deśakālayor abhede 'pi rūparasagandhasparśāḥ paryāyarūpeṇa bhidyante tataḥ[444]katham abhedasiddhiḥ? /
SA15arhebt_u:2831: svabhāvo 'pi yadi dravyaparyāyayor dvayor api pratyekam anuvṛttivyāvṛttirūpatā;
SA15arhebt_u:2833: na tv ekaṃ dvirūpam iti kathan tasmād abhedasiddhiḥ? /
SA15arhebt_u:2834: na cānuvṛttivyāvṛttī svabhāvo yuktaḥ, tayor anuvarttamānavyāvarttamānādhīnatvāt /
SA15arhebt_u:2836: na tu tayor anuvṛttivyāvṛttī eva svabhāvaḥ,
SA15arhebt_u:2838: na hi smṛtiḥ smarttuḥ svabhāvo bhavati /
SA15arhebt_u:2839: anuvṛttivyāvṛttyoś ca svabhāvatve[446]lakṣaṇāt svabhāvasya bhedo vaktavyaḥ /
SA15arhebt_u:2841: atrāpy abheda iti yadi sādṛśyam ucyate; tad bheda eva sambhavati, sādṛśyasya sadṛśādhikaraṇatvāt /
SA15arhebt_u:2843: eva syāt na tv ekaṃ dvirūpam iti /
SA15arhebt_u:2847: vipratiṣiddhaṃ hy etat ekasvabhāvatā dvirūpatā ceti /
SA15arhebt_u:2849: kathaṃ tarhi sa eka ity ucyate anekaḥ san? /
SA15arhebt_u:2853: yogyatvāc ca viśvasya kṛtākṛtānām[447]ekābhidhānābhidheyatvasya kvacid asambhavāt śaktibhedāc ca viṣayabhedaṃ bruvāṇaṃ [S. 105a.] prati abhihitam[448]/
SA15arhebt_u:2855: tathā hi -- śaśāṅkodayaṃ[449]bahavo nirīkṣante [T. 278a.] tasya katham {p. 104.1} ekatvam abhyupagatam? /
SA15arhebt_u:2858: sarvathedaṃ na kathañcid api saṅgacchate yaduta ekasya dvairūpyam iti /
SA15arhebt_u:2859: vijñānaṃ tu nīlapraticchāyatayotpadyamānaṃ pītādipratibhāsavyavacchedena prativiśiṣṭam khyāpyate,
SA15arhebt_u:2860: na punar asya bhāvato[450]dve rūpe staḥ /
SA15arhebt_u:2861: atha punar dravyaparyāyayoḥ sammūrcchitatvāt narasiṃhavad ekaṃ śabalarūpatvāt dvirūpam ucyate /
SA15arhebt_u:2864: te ca paramāṇavaḥ pratyekaṃ narasiṃharūpā na bhavanti,
SA15arhebt_u:2867: jātyantaraṃ ca sa eva narasiṃhābhyāṃ syāt, na śabalarūpaḥ /
SA15arhebt_u:2871: iti kevalam anekatve 'pi bahuṣv ekakāryadarśanāt senādivad[451]ekavyavahāradarśanakṛto 'yaṃ viparyāso jaḍamatīnām /
SA15arhebt_u:2872: tad evaṃ tāvat pratyekam ahetutvaṃ deśakālasvabhāvānām ekatvaprasādhane /
SA15arhebt_u:2874: tathā hi -- paryāyā abhinnadeśakālasvabhāvāś ca paryāyarūpeṇa ca bhidyante pūrvoktāc ca dharmadharmiṇor niṣedhān[452]nobhayavādasambhava iti /
SA15arhebt_u:2905: ekabhāvo yatas tasmān naikasya syād dvirūpatā// 21 //
SA15arhebt_u:2906: tasya bhedo 'pi tābhyāṃced yadi yenātmanāca te /
SA15arhebt_u:2915: tena yadi mṛtpiṇḍasya mṛdātmatāyāṃ vyāpāraḥ kulālasya tatsaṃsthānaviśeṣe kathyate,
SA15arhebt_u:2916: tadā tayor atyantabhedāt kāraṇānekatvāt kāryānekatvaṃ prāptam iti /
SA15arhebt_u:2918: mṛtsaṃsthānayoḥ svabhāvabhede dūṣaṇam uktam {p. 108.1} mṛtsaṃsthānayor aparasparātmatayā ityādikam iti na saṃsthānasya mṛddravyād anyatvam /
SA15arhebt_u:2919_1: tatkāryakṣaṇasahakāriṇā mṛtpiṇḍena ca pratyekaṃ sakalam eva mṛtsaṃsthānātmakaṃ kāryaṃ
SA15arhebt_u:2919_2: kriyata iti na kāraṇānekatve 'py anekatvam asya /
SA15arhebt_u:2922: yat tad ghaṭagataṃ saṃsthānaṃ yadi tata mṛdo bhinnaṃsyāt tadā kulālaḥ pṛthag eva kim iti na karoti? /
SA15arhebt_u:2924: kulālaś cānvayavyatirekābhyāṃ tasya saṃsthānasya guṇātmanaḥ kāraṇatayā gamyata iti sa pṛthag api tat kāryāt /
SA15arhebt_u:2926: {2}dravyāśrayya'guṇavān saṃyogavibhāgeṣv akāraṇam anapekṣa [VaiSū 1.1.16] iti guṇalakṣaṇāt sarvadā [S. 108b.] guṇo dravyapratantraḥ,
SA15arhebt_u:2929: yadi svabhāvenaiva tasya guṇātmanaḥ saṃsthānasya kriyāvad guṇavad [VaiSū 1.1.15] ityādivacanād ādhārasvabhāvaṃ tat mṛddravyaṃ,
SA15arhebt_u:2930: saṃsthānaṃ vā tathāvidhaṃ kapālādheyātmakaṃ tadā kim iti kulālavyāpāram apekṣate? /
SA15arhebt_u:2931: svata eva kiṃ na bhavati? iti codakābhiprayaḥ /
SA15arhebt_u:2932: evaṃ codyam āśaṅkyavaiśeṣikaḥparihāram āha -- na, tataḥ ityādi /
SA15arhebt_u:2933_0: yat tat mṛddravyaṃ pṛthuvudhnodarādyākāraṃ ca saṃsthānaṃ tayor yaḥ sambandha ādhārādheyalakṣaṇaḥ
SA15arhebt_u:2933_1: tatra yā yogyatā tāṃ dvayam apy etat kulālād yataḥ pratilabhate tasmāt kulālam apekṣate
SA15arhebt_u:2933_2: kulālānapekṣāyāṃ doṣam āha -- anyathā yadi tayoḥ parasparasambandhayogyatāyāṃ kulālāpekṣā
SA15arhebt_u:2933_3: na syāt tadā svabhāvata eva mṛtpiṇḍasya [T. 281a.] tathāvidhasaṃsthānasambandhayogyatvaṃ bhavet /
SA15arhebt_u:2934: tasmiṃś ca sati vastuna eva tatsaṃsthānasambandhayogyatālakṣaṇā dharmatā 'stīti kulālasannidheḥ prāg api saṃsthānaviśeṣeṇa sambandhaḥ syād itivaiśeṣikīyaścodyaparihāraḥ /
SA15arhebt_u:2940: yadi [S. 109a.] parasparasambandhayogyatāyāṃ kulālam apekṣate evaṃ tarhi sāyogyatāmṛddravyasya kulālād bhavati iti[474]āpannam /
SA15arhebt_u:2941: na ca anayoḥ mṛddravyayogyatayoḥ svabhāvasya bhedaḥ nānātvam /
SA15arhebt_u:2942: yadi hi syāt tadā yogyatāyāḥ dravyāt pṛthakkaraṇaṃ prāgvat prasajyeta /
SA15arhebt_u:2943_0: atha yogyatāyā api yogyapāratantryād apṛthaksiddhiṃ brūyāt tadā tasyā api vastudharmatayaiva
SA15arhebt_u:2943_1: prāg api samāveśo mā bhūd iti dravyeṇa saha sambandhayogyatāyā anyā yogyatā kulālād bhavatīty eṣṭavyā /
SA15arhebt_u:2945: pṛthakkaraṇaprasaṅge vā punaḥ sa eva parihāraḥ tadīyaḥ,
SA15arhebt_u:2947: ity anavasthāprasaṅgād avaśyam abhinnasvabhāvatā kapālātmamamṛddravyayogyatayor abhyupagantavyā /
SA15arhebt_u:2948: kim evaṃ sati siddhaṃ bhavati? ity ata āha -- asti tāvat ityādi /

SA15arhebt_u:3157: yāḥ kṣaṇe kṣaṇe 'nyāś cānyāś ca svabhāvabhedānvayinyaḥ śaktayo bhavanti tatrāyam ekārthakriyāpratiniyamaḥ sahakāriṇāṃ draṣṭavyaḥ /
SA15arhebt_u:3158: na tu ye sthiraikasvabhāvā bhāvāḥ paraiḥ kalpyante teṣv api /

SA15arhebt_u:3170: athāsamarthasvabhāvaḥ, tadāpi kriyā 'nupapannā, sarvadaiva na kuryād iti bhāvaḥ /
SA15arhebt_u:3171: yat tu kadācit karoti kadācin na [S. 118b.] ity etan na labhyate /
SA15arhebt_u:3174: yady api kevalasyāpy akṣaṇikasya samarthaḥ svabhāvaḥ tathāpi anyasahitaḥ karoti na kevalaḥ /
SA15arhebt_u:3175: ayam api hy asya svabhāvaḥ yad -- `anyasahitena svakāryaṃ karttavyam na samarthasvabhāvenāpi satā kevalena' iti /
SA15arhebt_u:3177: anyasahitenaiva svakāryaṃ karttavyaṃ na kevalena ity etat kevalasyāsamarthasvabhāvatve yujyate nānyatheti manyamānasya praśnaḥ /
SA15arhebt_u:3178: paras tv anavagatābhiprāya āha -- samartha iti /
SA15arhebt_u:3179: kevalasyāpy akṣaṇikasya samartha eva {p. 119.1} svabhāvaḥ anyathā 'syākṣaṇikataiva hīyeteti /
SA15arhebt_u:3180: siddhāntavādy āha -- kin na karoti iti /

SA15arhebt_u:3183: atha matam -- kevalasya yadi śiraś chidyate tathāpi na karotīty ata āha -- akurvan ityādi /

SA15arhebt_u:3188: devānāṃpriyaḥ ṛjuḥ mūrkho vā [T. 289a.] sukhasaṃvardhitatvāt ramaṇasvabhāvaḥ,
SA15arhebt_u:3192: yo hy anabhiyukto durvuddhiś ca sa kṛtam api vastu vismaraṇaprakṛtitvāt punaḥ punaḥ kārayatīti punaḥ pratividhāpayati /
SA15arhebt_u:3193: kva punar etat prativihitam? ity āha -- tathāhi -- ityādi /
SA15arhebt_u:3195_1: pratipādyopasaṃharann āha -- tasmāt tatsvabhāvasya kāryakriyāsamarthasya anyathātvāsambhā(mbha)
SA15arhebt_u:3196: vāt 4kadācid asamarthatvābhāvāt[504]taddharmaṇaḥ kāryakriyādharmaṇaḥ tathābhāvaḥ kāryakriyā antyāvasthāvat sahitāvasthāyām iva anivāryaḥ /{120}

SA15arhebt_u:3219: vijñānādikāryasyānutpattiyaugapadyodayaprasaṅgāt cakṣurādisānnidhye prāg asat tat sāmarthyam utpannaṃ kramavac ceti niścaya iti cet /
SA15arhebt_u:3221: kṛtaṃ pratyabhijñānam upajāyamānam apūrvasāmarthyapratibhāsaviviktopalādigrāhy[506]apy anumānād arthāpattito vā bādhām anubhavan na pramāṇam ity upagataṃ syāt /
SA15arhebt_u:3223_1: cārvāgdarśanānām ekatvavibhramo lūnapunarjjāteṣv iva keśanakhādiṣv iti kiṃ neṣyate? /
SA15arhebt_u:3230_0: atha sāmarthyaṃ sahakāripratyayasānnidhyalakṣaṇam evety atatsvabhāvam iti nāpūrvotpattiprasaṅga

SA15arhebt_u:3232: sāmarthyam ity ākhyā yasya padārthāntarasya sahakāripratyayasānnidhyalakṣaṇasya sa evātiśaya[śabda]vācya itinaiyāyikair abhyupagamāt /

SA15arhebt_u:3235: punar apy akṣaṇikānām ekārthakriyāpratiniyamaṃ nirākartum upacayahetum āha -- api ca ityādi /

SA15arhebt_u:3261_0: ity āha -- svabhāvas teṣāṃ bhāvānāṃ kāryakriyādharmā kāryakaraṇadharmā tena kāraṇena
SA15arhebt_u:3261_1: samastāh samagrāḥ pratyayāḥ sahakāriṇo yeṣāṃ teṣām akṛtvā kāryaṃ nopekṣāpattiḥ naudāsīny

SA15arhebt_u:3288: ,[515]tasyāparāpekṣasvabhāvabhedalakṣaṇatvāt[516]ity ata āha -- na hi sa sāhitye 'pi ityādi /

SA15arhebt_u:3358: akṣepeṇa kāryadarśanād akṣepakriyāsvabhāvatā 'vagamyate [T. 294a.] nānyathā iti parābhiprāyāśaṅkayā ''ha -- na kevalaḥ ityādi /

SA15arhebt_u:3366: yad apy uktaṃ `kāryasyaivāyam aparādho yat tasmiṃ(smin)

SA15arhebt_u:3382: tata evaikasmāt kāraṇād utpattyanutpattī parasparaviruddhe katham ekatra kāryākhye dharmiṇi syātām?
SA15arhebt_u:3384: ekatra te bruvāṇo `mātā ca vandhyā ca' ity anena sadṛśaṃ brūṣa iti na [S. 125b.] pūrvoktadoṣān mucyase,
SA15arhebt_u:3385_0: yata evam api bruvāṇo viruddham eva brūte na ca lakṣayati tat tasmāt ayam akṣaṇikavādī

SA15arhebt_u:3385_2: antarduḥkhahetutvāt tena vitudyamānāni vyathyamānāni marmāṇi yasya so yamīrṣyāśalyavitudyamānamarmā
SA15arhebt_u:3386_0: apy alakṣayan viklavam ākulaṃ pūrvāparāsambaddhaṃ vikrośati viroditi iti kṛtvā asvasthacittavacaneṣv

SA15arhebt_u:3388: tad evam akṣaṇikeṣu na kathañcid ekārthakriyāpratiniyamalakṣaṇaṃ sahakāritvaṃ [T. 295a.] sambhavatīti pratipādyopasaṃhārann āha -- tasmād idam ityādi /

SA15arhebt_u:3400: kiṃ tarhi bahūnām ekārthakaraṇam eva' ity ata āha -- yatra tu santānopakāreṇa {p. 128.1} ityādi /

SA15arhebt_u:3403: bījādibhyaś cāṅkurādijanmani pṛthivyādayaḥ -- tatra viśeṣotpādane pratyayānāṃ sahakriyocyate loke /
SA15arhebt_u:3405: tya [T. 295b.] pūrvottarakṣaṇayor ekatvādhyavasāyena tasyaivāyam atiśaya iti na dravyāśrayeṇa /

SA15arhebt_u:3419: ata āha -- na hi taṇḍulādīnām ityādi /

SA15arhebt_u:3421: [T. 296a.] tathā prabhāsvarād apavarakaṃ praviṣṭasya yadīndriyaṃ svopakāribhyo 'tiśayaṃ krameṇa na pratipadyate tadā prāg iva paścād apy arthapratipattiṃ naiva janayet /
SA15arhebt_u:3422: {p. 129.1} tasmād yad asambhavi kāryaṃ yatra dṛśyate tasya tato 'nyatvam eva,
SA15arhebt_u:3423: śālibījād iva kodravabījasyeti niratiśayād anyatvam eva sātiśayatayā tatkāryakāriṇa iti /

SA15arhebt_u:3425: yatra tv akṣepeṇaivārthasannidhimātreṇa sahakāriṇaḥ kāryaṃ kurvanti kiṃ tatrāpi santānāśrayam atiśayotpādanam asti?
SA15arhebt_u:3427: `ye hy avyavadhānādideśā indriyādayaḥ svahetubhyo jātās teṣv avilambitakāriṣu na viśeṣotpattiḥ parasparataḥ sambhavati,
SA15arhebt_u:3429: yadi na viśeṣotpattiḥ tadā kathaṃ nirviśeṣā jñānasya kāraṇī bhavanti?
SA15arhebt_u:3430: ity ata āha -- tatra yathāsvaṃ yasya ye ātmīyāḥ pratyayāḥ taiḥ,
SA15arhebt_u:3431_1: deśaś ca sa ādir yasyāvyavahitadeśādeḥ tatrāvasthānam avasthā yeṣāṃ te saha svabhāvaniṣpattyā
SA15arhebt_u:3432: yadi hi svahetubhya eva parasparopasarppaṇādyāśrebhyaḥ svakāryajananakṣamā yogyadeśādyavasthānalakṣaṇaviśeṣayogino notpadyeran,
SA15arhebt_u:3434: na tu svahetubhya eva tathāvidhānām utpattau /

SA15arhebt_u:3437: atha viśeṣotpādanalakṣaṇaṃ sahakāritvaṃ kathaṃ na vyavasthāpyate? /
SA15arhebt_u:3438: tad api hi loke pratītatvād vyavasthāpanīyam evety ata āha -- yatra tu kārye nāvyavadhānādideśopanipātamātreṇaivendriyādaya iva sahakāriṇaḥ pratyayatāṃ pratipadyante,
SA15arhebt_u:3439_0: kintu {p. 230.1} vivakṣitakāryotpādānuguṇaṃ pratikṣaṇaṃ prakṛṣyamāṇaṃ viśeṣam utpādayantaḥ
SA15arhebt_u:3439_1: tatra kālakṣepabhāvini kārye karttavye hetusantāno 'parāparakṣaṇabhāvalakṣaṇa ātmātiśayāsādanārthaṃ
SA15arhebt_u:3441: tatas tebhyaḥ kāraṇāntarebhyaḥ svabhāvāntarasya kāryotpādānuguṇaviśeṣaparamparālakṣaṇasya pratilabhyaḥ santānasyaikatvenādhimuktasyocyate loke /
SA15arhebt_u:3442: paramārthas tu tatrāpi pūrvaḥ pūrvaḥ pratyayakalāpa uttarottarakāryotpādānuguṇe [T. 297a.] viśiṣṭakṣaṇe pratiniyata ity ekārthakriyālakṣaṇam eva sahakāritvam
SA15arhebt_u:3445: , yataḥ krameṇa kāryaṃ nirvarttayantīty ata āha -- tatra svarasataḥ ityādi /

SA15arhebt_u:3446_2: nivṛttau satyāṃ tebhya eva svarasato nivarttamānebhyaḥ prathamakṣaṇebhyaḥ kāryotpādānuguṇena
SA15arhebt_u:3447: evaṃ yāvad atyantātiśayavānantyaḥ kāraṇakalāpo jātaḥ tataḥ kāryasyotpattiḥ ity evaṃ sahakāribhyaḥ svabhāvāntarapratilambhaḥ,

SA15arhebt_u:3451_0: yat samutpannaviśeṣam anantaroktena prakāreṇa kāraṇaṃ antyasāmagrīkṣaṇalakṣaṇaṃ tato
SA15arhebt_u:3451_2: krameṇābhivarddhamānaḥ kāryasya janaka iṣyate tasyaiva utpattir na syāt prathamakṣaṇopanipātināṃ
SA15arhebt_u:3451_3: [T. 297b.] parasparato viśeṣānāsādanāt kṣaṇānām avivekāt anabhyupagamāc ca /

SA15arhebt_u:3457_0: āha -- tena yena kṣaṇikā api parasparato viśeṣotpādā 'napekṣā eva svakāryaṃ kurvanti
SA15arhebt_u:3457_1: ekakāryapratiniyamalakṣaṇaṃ ca sahakāritvaṃ pratipadyante tena kāraṇena akṣaṇikānām api kāraṇatāsyāt,
SA15arhebt_u:3458: apekṣaṇīyebhyaḥsvabhāvātiśayotpattiśca na syāt ity akṣaṇikavādī kṣaṇikapakṣeṇa[531]svapakṣasya sāmyamāpādayati / yad āha -
SA15arhebt_u:3470: tatraitat syāt prathamakṣaṇe 'pi kṣitibījādayaḥ parasparataḥ samutpannaviśeṣā eva sannidhīyante --
SA15arhebt_u:3472: iti nyāyād dhi dūradeśavarttinām api hetuphalabhāvāt ity āśaṅkyāha -- atha sahakāriṇā ityādi /
SA15arhebt_u:3473: sahakāriṇaḥ [T. 298a.] parasparasamparkkavikalā api vastudharmatayaivānyonyam upakurvantīti sahakāriṇā kāryotpādānuguṇaviśeṣajananāya kṛtaviśeṣa eva samparkkakāla upatiṣṭheta,
SA15arhebt_u:3475: tathā hi -- tadviśeṣotpattāv apy aparaḥ sahakārikṛto viśeṣo 'bhyupagantavyaḥ,
SA15arhebt_u:3477: atha naivaṃ sahakāriṇaḥ parasparasya kāryotpādānuguṇaviśeṣanimittam aparaṃ viśeṣaṃ kurvanti,
SA15arhebt_u:3478: svabhāvata eva tatra teṣāṃ yogyatvāt ity ata āha -- na ca ityādi /
SA15arhebt_u:3479_0: naiva hi sahakāriṇaḥ kṣitibījādayaḥ parasparasya kāryotpādānuguṇo yo viśeṣaḥ tadutpādane
SA15arhebt_u:3479_1: nityaṃ sarvakālaṃ yogyāvasthā yena yogyāvasthatvena nityānuśaktaḥ nityānubaddhaḥ

SA15arhebt_u:3479_3: viśeṣotpattau kāryasyāpi syāt' ity etad api parihriyeta /
SA15arhebt_u:3480: kuta etad? ity āha -- tadupāya ityādi /
SA15arhebt_u:3481: teṣāṃ kṣitibījādīnām upāye -- yogyadeśopanipāte kāryavyaktidarśanāt[532]apāye ca -- parasparasamparkkavirāme kāryānutpattidarśanāt /
SA15arhebt_u:3482: yadi hi kāryotpādānuguṇaviśeṣotpādane sarvadā yogyāvasthāḥ syuḥ tadā so 'pi viśeṣaḥ sarvadā [T. 298b.] syāt /
SA15arhebt_u:3483: tatas tatparamparābhāvi kāryam iti tadupāyāpāyayoḥ kāryasyotpattyanutpattī na syātām /
SA15arhebt_u:3484: [S. 130a.] tasmān na sahakāriṇaḥ kāryotpādānuguṇaviśeṣotpādane yogyāvasthāḥ sarvadeti /
SA15arhebt_u:3485: yataḥ sahakāriṇā pṛthagavasthitenānavasthābhayāt kṛtaviśeṣo nopatiṣṭhate parasparataś ca prathamasamparkkakṣaṇabhāvināṃ nopeyate[533]yujyate vā /
SA15arhebt_u:3486: tena kāraṇenādyo viśeṣaḥ kāryotpādānuguṇaḥ sahakāribhyaḥ samānakālatayā nirupakārasya kṣitibījādeḥ notpadyate[534],
SA15arhebt_u:3488: tena samagrāvasthāvat sarveṣāṃ vyagrāvasthābhāvinām api kṣaṇānām aviśeṣāt
SA15arhebt_u:3490_0: yathā kṣaṇikānām ekārthakriyāpratiniyamalakṣaṇaṃ sahakāritvaṃ tathā sthirasvabhāvānām
SA15arhebt_u:3490_1: api bhaviṣyatīti kṣīṇasarvopāyo 'kṣaṇikavādī sāmyam evātura iva bahumanyamānas tatraiva
SA15arhebt_u:3491: siddhāntavādī bhaṅgyā param upahasann āha -- nāsmākaṃpunaḥpunaḥ ityādi /
SA15arhebt_u:3492: yadi punaḥ punar vacane 'pi lokasya nyāyapratītir bhavati śataśo 'pi brūmaḥ /
SA15arhebt_u:3493: kim aṅga punar dvau trīn vā vārān? /
SA15arhebt_u:3494: na hi parārthapravṛttānām asmākaṃ punaḥ punar abhidhāne kaścid udvego bhavati /
SA15arhebt_u:3495: evaṃ vādinaś ca śāstrakṛtaḥ kvacit prakārāntareṇa[536]tam evārthaṃ [T. 299a.] sphuṭīkurvato ye punaruktāparihārāya yat ante sa teṣām asthānapariśrama eva /
SA15arhebt_u:3496: yadi nodvego hanta tarhy ucyatām ity ata āha -- na viśeṣotpādanād eva ityādi /
SA15arhebt_u:3497: naiva viśeṣotpādanāt {p. 133.1} sahakāriṇāṃ sahakāritvaṃ paramārthataḥ kvacit [S. 130b.] sambhavati,
SA15arhebt_u:3498: yataḥ prathamakṣaṇabhāvināṃ bījādīnāṃ tadabhāvāt kāryotpādānuguṇe viśeṣe karttavye sahakāritāvirahaḥ syāt /
SA15arhebt_u:3499: kintv ekārthakriyaiva sahakāriṇāṃ pāramārthikaṃ sahakāritvaṃ pūrvoktābhir yuktibhiḥ sambhāvyate /
SA15arhebt_u:3502: para āha -- sā 'py ekārthakriyā na bhavet parasparato viśeṣarahitānām /
SA15arhebt_u:3503: yadi punaḥ parasparato viśeṣarahitānām api tadekārthakriyā 'ṅgīkriyate tadā pratyekaṃ tadavasthāyāṃ tadutpādanasāmarthyābhyupagamāt tadavasthāyām iva pṛthag api sā bhavet /
SA15arhebt_u:3504: tathā hi -- te tadavasthāyām api parasparato nirviśeṣā eva kurvanti /
SA15arhebt_u:3505: teṣāṃ pṛthag api tadviśeṣakriyā katham iva na prasajyeta? /
SA15arhebt_u:3506: na hy eṣāṃ saṃhatāsaṃhatāvasthayoḥ kaścid viśeṣo 'stīti /
SA15arhebt_u:3509: tathāca kāryotpādānuguṇaviśeṣasya pṛthakkaraṇaprasaṅge sati tasmād viśeṣād bhavanaśīlam aṅkurādi kāryam api viśeṣavat kevalāt sahakāriṇaḥ syāt iti cen manyase,
SA15arhebt_u:3511: tathā hi -- saṃhatāsaṃhatāvasthayor nirviśeṣā eva kṣaṇakṣayiṇo bhāvā iti taducyate tat kiṃ tāvad viśeṣamātrāpekṣayā?
SA15arhebt_u:3516: na hi kadācit kiṃcid ekam eva, ādhāracchāyātapavātaśītāder yathāsambhavaṃ bhāvāt /
SA15arhebt_u:3517: na ca tabhāve 'pi tat tādṛśam eva, kāraṇabhedāt /
SA15arhebt_u:3518: etāvat tu syāt -- kaścid viśeṣaḥ kvacit kārye 'nuguṇo na sarvaḥ sarvatreti /
SA15arhebt_u:3519: etac ca prāg evoktam iti darśayann āha -- pratikṣaṇam aparāparaiḥpratyayaiḥ iti /
SA15arhebt_u:3520: `aparāparapratyayayogena pratikṣaṇaṃ bhinnaśaktayaḥ saṃskārāḥ santanvanto yady api kutaścit sāmyāt sarūpāḥ pratīyante,
SA15arhebt_u:3523: `kṣaṇikeṣu {p.134.1} bhāveṣv aparāparotpatter aikyābhāvāt'[538]iti cātra saṃkṣiptataram uktam /
SA15arhebt_u:3524: evaṃ ca `nāsmākaṃ punaḥ punar vacana' ity atra dviḥ punargrahaṇaṃ yujyate /
SA15arhebt_u:3525: yathā yena prakāreṇa bhāvasantāneviśeṣasyotpattiḥ [ta]d apy uktam
SA15arhebt_u:3526: -- `tatra svarasataḥ pūrvakṣaṇanirodhe tebhya eva viśiṣṭakṣaṇotpādād viśeṣotpattiḥ'[539]iti /
SA15arhebt_u:3527: atha kāryotpādānuguṇaviśeṣajanakaviśeṣāpekṣayā prāgvat prathamasamparkkabhājaḥ parasparato nirviśeṣā ity abhimataṃ tad apy ayuktam /
SA15arhebt_u:3528: yataḥ kāryotpādānuguṇasya viśeṣasya janakāḥ [S. 131b.] kṣitibījādayaḥ kīdṛśāḥ ye [T. 300a.] vyavadhānādirahitatvenopanipātinaḥ /

SA15arhebt_u:4317: samavāyikāraṇāsambhavād evānekadravyavattvam apy asambhavi yasmād anekaṃ dravyam ārambhakaṃ samavāyikāraṇātmanā yasya vidyate tad evaṃvyapadiśyate /
SA15arhebt_u:4319: sattve 'pi mahattvāder neyam upalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptir asmākam abhimatā /
SA15arhebt_u:4321_1: śāstrakāro darśayām babhūva [S. 161b.] upalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptasya yā anupalabdhiḥ
SA15arhebt_u:4321_2: kāraṇasya vyāpakasya vā pratiṣedhyād anyasya sā abhāvahetuḥ kāryasya vyāpyasya ca
SA15arhebt_u:4322: yātu pratiṣedhyasyaivopalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptasyānupalabdhiḥ sā 'bhāvavyavahārahetur eveti vāśabdena darśayati / yā tv
SA15arhebt_u:4323: anupalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptasyānupalabdhiḥ pratyakṣānumānanivṛttilakṣaṇā sā saṃśayahetuḥ pramāṇanivṛttāv apy arthābhāvāsiddheḥ,
SA15arhebt_u:4336: tatra ye tāvad upalabdhyabhāvamātram anupalabdhim icchanti,
SA15arhebt_u:4337: vijñānaṃvā'nyavastuni [ŚlV abhāvapariccheda 11d.] iti vacanāt tadanyavastuvijñānam eva vā,
SA15arhebt_u:4338_1: eva tāvad dvividhām darśayann āha -- atra anupalabdhivākye yopalabdhiḥ śrūyate kriyārūpā
SA15arhebt_u:4338_2: sā yadā kartṛsthatayā 'pekṣyate tadā tasyā upalabhamānasya kartuḥ dharmatve apekṣyamāṇe
SA15arhebt_u:4338_3: tajjñānam upalabhamānasya yajjñānaṃ tad upalabdhir ucyate /
SA15arhebt_u:4339: upalabhamānaś ca buddhīndriyadehakalāpa eva ca pūrvakṣaṇasaṅgṛhīta[636]upalabdhijanaka ucyate /
SA15arhebt_u:4340: tathā hi -- upalabdher janaka āśrayo vā karttā parair ucyate /
SA15arhebt_u:4341: na {p. 170.1} cendriyāder anyasya janakatvaṃ [S. 162a.] sambhavati yato 'nvayavyatirekanibandhanaḥ kāryakāraṇabhāvavyavahāraḥ,
SA15arhebt_u:4342: tau cānvayavyatirekau nendriyāder anyasya sambhavataḥ satsv indriyādiṣu niyamenopalabdher bhāvāt / yadi
SA15arhebt_u:4343: hīndriyādiṣu satsv api kadācid upalabdhir nopajāyate tadā satsv apy anyeṣu sakaleṣu hetuṣu kāryānutpattiḥ kāraṇāntaravaikalyaṃ sūcayatīti tadvyatiriktakāraṇāntaraṃ parikalpyeta /
SA15arhebt_u:4344: na caitad asti, tat katham ātmanas tadutpattau nimittabhāvo[637]'bhyupagamyeta?
SA15arhebt_u:4346: 3yasmin sati bhavaty eva yat tato 'nyasya kalpane /
SA15arhebt_u:4347: taddhetutvena sarvatra hetūnām anavasthitiḥ[638]// [PV I 26] iti /
SA15arhebt_u:4348: āśrayatvam api janakasyaiveti tad apy ātmano na sambhavati /
SA15arhebt_u:4350: kṣāṇikatve sthiter abhāvād upalabdher akṣaṇikatve 'pi svayam evāvināśād avasthānāt /
SA15arhebt_u:4351: tathā hi -- upalabdher avināśa eva sthitir ucyate na pātābhāvaḥ [T. 327b.] tasyā gurutvābhāvāt saṃyogābhāvena gurutvāt patanam [VSū V.1.7.] iti capareṣāṃkṛtāntaḥ /
SA15arhebt_u:4352: samavāyād[639]āśraya iti cet; nanu so 'pi ādhāryādhārabhūtānām eveṣyate /
SA15arhebt_u:4357: kramayaugapadyābhyām arthakriyāvirodhāc ca nāsyātmanaḥ sattvam, tato 'sya kuto janakatvam?
SA15arhebt_u:4360: evam upalabdhim ādarśyānupalabdhim ādarśayann āha -- tasmād upalabdhijñānād anyā vastvantaraviṣayā upalabdhiḥ jñānātmikā anupalabdhiḥ /
SA15arhebt_u:4361: kathaṃ punar upalabdhir evānupalabhdir ucyate? ity āha -- vivakṣitetyādi /
SA15arhebt_u:4362: yathā bhakṣyābhakṣyaprakaraṇe vivakṣitād bhakṣyād anyatvād `abhakṣyo grāmyakukkuṭaḥ' -- bhakṣyo 'pi san tadanyasya -- ucyate /
SA15arhebt_u:4363: yathā ca sparśanīyāsparśanīyādhikāre vivakṣitāt sparśanīyād anyatvād `asparśanīyaś cāṇḍālādiḥ' -- tadanyasya sparśanīyo 'pi san -- ucyate /
SA15arhebt_u:4365: nañaḥ pratiṣedhaviṣayatvāt kathaṃ bhāvaviṣayatā? iti cet, āha -- paryudāsavṛttyeti /
SA15arhebt_u:4366: paryudāsena pratiṣedhyasyārthasya varjanena yā viśiṣṭe 'rthe vṛttis tayā,
SA15arhebt_u:4368: yatra vidheḥ [S. 163a.] prādhānyaṃ pratiṣedho 'rthagṛhītaḥ vidhibhāk svapadena nocyate ekavākyatā ca tatra paryudāsavṛttitā /
SA15arhebt_u:4369_0: vidheś ca prādhānyaṃ `vivakṣitopalabdher anyopalabdhir bhavati' ity evaṃ vākyenānyopalabdher
SA15arhebt_u:4369_1: vidhānāt [T. 328a.] anyopalabdhisāmarthyād eva vivakṣitopalabdheḥ pratiṣedhaḥ pratīyate /
SA15arhebt_u:4370: vivakṣitopalabdher anivarttane tadapekṣayā 'nyasyā vidhānāyogāt svapadena nañā vidhibhāṅ nocyate /
SA15arhebt_u:4372: anyaśabdena paryudāsāśrayeṇā 'nyaśabdasyaiva vākye prayogāt anyā upalabdhir anupalabdhir iti /
SA15arhebt_u:4373: nañaś ca subantena sāmarthyaṃ na tiṅantena ity ekavākyatvaṃ `na upalabdhir anupalabdhiḥ' iti /
SA15arhebt_u:4375: tatra hi pratiṣedhasya prādhānyaṃ vidhir arthād gamyate vākyabhedaḥ svapadena nañā pratiṣedhabhāk sambadhyate /
SA15arhebt_u:4376: tad evaṃ jñātṛdharmalakṣaṇām anupalabdhiṃ vyākhyāya jñeyadharmalakṣaṇāṃ pratipādayann āha -- upalabhyamānadharmatva ityādi /
SA15arhebt_u:4377: yadā karmasthakriyāpekṣayopalabhyamānasya vastuno dharma upalabdhir vivakṣyate tadā viṣayasvabhāva upalabdhir mantavyā /
SA15arhebt_u:4379: pratiṣedhyasya ghaṭāder yadātmaviṣayaṃ vijñānaṃ tajjanane yā yogyatā tallakṣaṇo viṣayasvabhāva upalabdhiśabdenocyate /
SA15arhebt_u:4381: tathā hi yogyatā dharmaḥ, dharmadharmiṇoś ca bheda eva ity ata āha --yogyatāyāḥ ityādi /
SA15arhebt_u:4382: yogyatā hi paramārthato [T. 328b.] bhāvarūpaiva na vastusvarūpād bhidyate,
SA15arhebt_u:4383: anyathā bhāvo yogya eva na syāt /
SA15arhebt_u:4384: yogyatā 'syeti ca sambandho bhāvato na syāt /
SA15arhebt_u:4386: tad evam upalabdher viṣayadharmatāṃ pratipādyānupalabdher api pratipādayann āha tasmād anyaḥ ityādi /
SA15arhebt_u:4387_1: eva na tadviparītaḥ svabhāvo ghaṭaviviktapradeśarūpaḥ sa eva cātrānupalabdhiśabdenocyate /
SA15arhebt_u:4388: prāktanam eva nyāyam atrādiśann[642]āha pūrvavad iti /
SA15arhebt_u:4390: kathaṃ punar ayaṃ nañ anyārthavṛttiḥ sāmānyaśabdaḥ san ghaṭaviviktapradeśasya [S. 164a.] tajjñānasyaiva 3vā ghaṭaviviktasyānupalabdhitvaṃ[643]paryudāsavṛttyā prakalpayati,
SA15arhebt_u:4392: ity ata āha-- yatra yasmin ityādi /
SA15arhebt_u:4394: yasmin pradeśarūpādau upalabhyamāne niyamena avaśyaṃtayā yasyānyasya
SA15arhebt_u:4395: padārthasya ghaṭrarūpāder upalabdhir bhavati sa ghaṭarūpādiḥ padārthaḥ tatsaṃsṛṣṭaḥ tena pradeśarūpādinā saṃsṛṣṭaḥ /
SA15arhebt_u:4396: katham ekasminn upalabhyamāne parasyāpi niyamopalabdhiḥ? iti cet, yogyatāyā aviśeṣāt /
SA15arhebt_u:4398: yadā hi pradeśarūpaṃ vyavadhānaviprakarṣādirahitaṃ vijñāne svākāraṃ samarppayati tadā ghaṭarūpam api tatra[644]tathāvidhaṃ svākāraṃ samarppayaty eva /
SA15arhebt_u:4399: yadi nāma yogyatā tasya tena tulyā svasvabhāvavyavasthites tu kathaṃ tatsaṃsṛṣṭatā?
SA15arhebt_u:4401: ekatra hi jñāne dvāv api tau svākāradvāreṇa saṃsṛṣṭau na sākṣāt,
SA15arhebt_u:4402: tadvijñānaṃ padārthadvayākāram ājāyamānaṃ tayor ātmani saṃsarggaṃ darśayati /
SA15arhebt_u:4403: kim iti punas tat jñānaṃ padārthadvayākāram avaśyaṃ [S. 164b.] bhavati yatas tayor jñānadvārakaḥ saṃsarggaḥ?
SA15arhebt_u:4405: yāv etau tulyayogyatārūpau tau yadi santau bhavatas tadā naivaikākāraniyatā pratipattir bhavati /
SA15arhebt_u:4407: na hy eṣa sambhavo 'sti -- yat tulyayogyatārūpayor eka eva pratibhāseta nāpara iti /
SA15arhebt_u:4408: tathā hi -- aviśiṣṭatvād yogyatāyāḥ kas tatra svākāraṃ na samarppayet? /
SA15arhebt_u:4410: na cānubhavaviruddham ācakṣaṇā viduṣām avadheyavacaso bhavanti /
SA15arhebt_u:4413: karaṇadharma evāyaṃ yad ekasminn eva karmaṇi kriyāṃ niṣpādayati nānekatra,
SA15arhebt_u:4414: karaṇaṃ cendriyaṃ tato nānekapratipattihetur iti cet,
SA15arhebt_u:4417: karttrekatvāt tarhi kriyaikatra karmāṇīti kathaṃ `karaṇadharmaḥ' ityādi vaco na plavate? /
SA15arhebt_u:4418: na ca pratikṣaṇaviśarāruṣu bhāveṣu paramārthataḥ kartṛkaraṇādibhāvo [S. 165a.] yuktaḥ
SA15arhebt_u:4420: na ca sarrvakārakānvayavyatirekānuvidhāyini kārye kasyacid atiśayo 'sti yenāyaṃ karttā kā(ka)
SA15arhebt_u:4422: tasmād aviśiṣṭayogyatayoḥ kuta ekarūpaniyatāyāḥ pratipatteḥ sambhavaḥ?
SA15arhebt_u:4425: na hy asati tulyayogyatārūpatve yugapad ekendriyajanitajñānapratibhāsitā rūparasavat sambhavatīti /
SA15arhebt_u:4426: tatra yeṣāṃsaugatānām idaṃ darśanaṃ `ekāyatanasaṅgṛhīte 'nekatrāpy ekam evendriyajñānam ājāyate' iti teṣāṃ mukhya evaikajñānasaṃsarggaḥ /
SA15arhebt_u:4427: ye tu `tatrāpi pratyarthaṃ bhinnāny evaikendriyanimittāny ekakālāni tadviṣayāṇāṃ yugapat sannihitānāṃ svajñāneṣu sāmarthyāviśeṣāt,
SA15arhebt_u:4428_0: ata[646]evaikatayā loke 'dhyavasīyamānāni jñānāny upajāyante` iti varṇayanti [T.
SA15arhebt_u:4429: yadi nāmaikajñānasaṃsarggāt tatsaṃsṛṣṭasyāpi [S. 165b.] sāmānyena sarvam anyam ayaṃ nañ kin na pratipādayati?
SA15arhebt_u:4431_0: yasmād aviśiṣṭatvād yogyatāyā yathoktena prakāreṇaikatra jñāne dvayor api saṃsarggaḥ
SA15arhebt_u:4431_1: tasmād aviśiṣṭaṃ yogyatārūpaṃ yayoḥ tata evaikajñānasaṃsarggiṇau tau tasmāt tayor
SA15arhebt_u:4431_2: evaṃrūpayoḥ parasparāpekṣam eva na sarvānyapadārthāpekṣam anyatvam iha anupalabdhyadhikāre abhipretam /
SA15arhebt_u:4432: loke tu yady aviśeṣapadārthāntarāpekṣam anyatvaṃ nañā kvacid ucyate vyāptinyāyasamāśrayāt,
SA15arhebt_u:4434: {p. 174.1} pratyāsatterāśrayaṇāt ekajñānasaṃsarggalakṣaṇā prattyāsattir āśrīyate nā 'nyā pramāṇacintādhikārāt anyathā 'nupalabdhir anaikāntikyeva syāt /
SA15arhebt_u:4435: tasmāt tattvacintakais tathāvidham anyatvam āśrayaṇīyam yad anupalabdher avyabhicāranibandhanam /
SA15arhebt_u:4437: tad evam ekajñānasaṃsarggāpekṣayā 'nyatvaṃ pratipādyānupalabdhiṃ darśayann āha -- sa kevalaḥ ityādi /
SA15arhebt_u:4438: sa eva yadā kevalaḥ pradeśo yathoktaghaṭāpekṣayā tasmād anya ucyate [S. 166a.] tadā ghaṭaviviktapradeśajñānaṃ [T. 330b.] vā 'nupalabdhiḥ,
SA15arhebt_u:4439: na tu yatheśvaraseno manyate upalabdhyabhāvamātram anupalabdhir iti,
SA15arhebt_u:4442: na tu tadviviktajñānam eva yathāhakumārilaḥvijñānaṃvānyavastuni [ŚlV abhāvapariccheda 11d.] iti /
SA15arhebt_u:4443: yathā hy anyavastuviṣayaṃ jñānam anubhūyamānaṃ pratiyogismaraṇāpekṣaṃ tadabhāvavyavahāranibandhanaṃ tathā tadviviktaḥ pradeśo 'pi /
SA15arhebt_u:4444: tathā hi -- kasyacit pratipattuḥ `yataḥ kevalapradeśākāram eva jñānaṃ mayā saṃvedyate na tu ghaṭākāram api tasmād atra ghaṭo nāsti` iti evaṃ nāstitājñānam utpadyate;
SA15arhebt_u:4445: kasyacit tu `yataḥ kevalaḥ pradeśo 'yaṃ dṛśyate na tu ghaṭasahitaḥ tasmān nāsty atra ghaṭaḥ` ity
SA15arhebt_u:4447: tasmād ubhayor nāstitājñānajanmani tulyaṃ sāmarthyam iti dvayor api anupalabdhivyavasthā yukteti /
SA15arhebt_u:4448: tatra yadā tajjñānaṃ tadā jñātṛdharmalakṣaṇā 'nupalabdhiḥ kartṛsthakriyā 'pekṣayā yadā tatsvabhāvas tadā jñeyadharmalakṣaṇā karmasthakriyāpekṣayeti /
SA15arhebt_u:4449: evam anupalabdhiṃ [S. 166b.] paryudāsavṛttyā vyavasthāpya sādhyam asyā darśayann āha -- sāabhāvam ityādi /
SA15arhebt_u:4450: sarvānyopalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptavivikte 'pi [T. 331a.] pradeśādau dṛśyamāne yatra ghaṭādau pratiyoginy arthitvādibhiḥ smṛtir asya bhavati tasyābhāvaṃ sādhayati,
SA15arhebt_u:4455: tatra `nāsty atra ghaṭaḥ` ity evam ākāraṃ jñānam,
SA15arhebt_u:4456: evaṃvidhavastvabhidhāyakaṃ cābhidhānaṃ niḥśaṅkasya ca tatra pradeśe gamanāgamanalakṣaṇā pravṛttir iti /
SA15arhebt_u:4457: {p. 175.1} atreśvarasenakumārilayor vacanāvakāśam āśaṅkya siddhāntavyavasthām eva kurvatā tanmate niraste 'pyāhatya tanmatanirāsārtham āha -- katham anyabhāva ityādi /
SA15arhebt_u:4458: īśvaraseno hi manyate -- kārya-svabhāvahetubhyāṃ bhāvarūpābhyāṃ anupalabdheḥ pṛthakkaraṇād avaśyam abhāvarūpatvam asyāḥ,
SA15arhebt_u:4460: tvayā [S. 167a.] cānyasya pratiṣedhyaviviktasya pradeśādes tajjñānasya vā bhāvarūpānupalabdhir ākhyāyate tannūnam anyabhāvas tadabhāvo yenaivam abhidhīyate /
SA15arhebt_u:4461: na caitad yujyate, bhāvābhāvayor virodhād ekātmatānupapatter iti /
SA15arhebt_u:4462: kumārilo 'py evaṃ manyate -- yeyaṃ jñātṛ-jñeyadharmalakṣaṇā dvidhā 'nupalabdhir abhāvarūpā tvayocyate tasyā bhavatu nāstitājñānaṃ prati sādhanabhāvaḥ /
SA15arhebt_u:4463: kintu sa evānyasya pratiṣedhyaviviktasya vastunaḥ [T. 331b.] pratiṣedhyajñānād anyasya vā tajjñānasya yo bhāvo bhāvāṃśaḥ sa katham abhāvaḥ?
SA15arhebt_u:4466: saty api dharmirūpeṇābhede tayoś codbhavābhibhavābhyāṃ grahaṇāgrahaṇavyavastheti / yad āha --
SA15arhebt_u:4467: dharmayor bheda iṣṭo hi dharmyabhede 'pi naḥsthite /
SA15arhebt_u:4470: uktottaratām asya darśayann āha -- uktam uttaram atra codye yathā paryudāsavṛttyāapekṣātaḥ /
SA15arhebt_u:4471: `pratiṣedhyaṃ tajjñānaṃ vā apekṣya tadvivikto 'rthas tajjñānaṃ [S. 167b.] vā 'bhāvo 'nupalabdhiś cocyate` itiīśvarasenasya prativacanam /
SA15arhebt_u:4472: na hi prasajyapratiṣedha evaiko nañarthaḥ kin tu paryudāso 'pi /
SA15arhebt_u:4478: paramārthatas tu pratiṣedhyābhāvavyavahārayogyatā {p. 176.1} vastubhūtaiva pradeśasya sādhyata iti na svabhāvahetoḥ svabhāvānupalabdhir bhidyata[649]iti /
SA15arhebt_u:4479: yat tu `anapekṣitārthāntarasaṃsarggaṃ pratiṣedhamātram anupalabdhiḥ` itīśvaraseno manyate tannirākurvann āha -- na pratiṣedhamātram ityādi /
SA15arhebt_u:4480: kasmāt? ity āha -- tasya sādhanāsiddheḥ ityādi /
SA15arhebt_u:4481: [T. 332a.] na hy abhāvasya sarvasāmarthyavirahalakṣaṇasya sādhanatvaṃ siddhihetutvaṃ sidhyati,
SA15arhebt_u:4483: hetutve vā kathaṃ na sāmarthyayogitā? bhāvarūpatā vā?, sāmarthyalakṣaṇatvād vastunaḥ /
SA15arhebt_u:4484: abhāvasya [S. 168a.] cānapekṣitasahakāriṇo anādheyātiśayatayā nāstīti jñānajanane nityaṃ tajjananaprasaṅgaḥ /
SA15arhebt_u:4485: tataś ca sādhakatvāyogād abhāvavyavahāra eva na sidhyet /
SA15arhebt_u:4486: athavā tasya prasajyapratiṣedhātmana upalabdhyabhāvasya sādhanam eva kiñcin na sidhyatīti /
SA15arhebt_u:4487: sa hy abhāvatvād apareṇopalabdhyabhāvena sādhyaḥ syāt, so 'py apareṇety anavasthānam /
SA15arhebt_u:4490: idaṃ cārthadvayaṃ `katham abhāvaḥ kasyacit, pratipattiḥ pratipattihetur vā? /
SA15arhebt_u:4491: tasyāpi kathaṃ pratipattiḥ` ity 4atrāntare svayam eva vipañcayiṣyati[651]/
SA15arhebt_u:4492: kumārilasyāpy uttaram āha -- tasya anyasya pratiyoginā vastvantareṇāsaṃsṛṣṭarūpasya /
SA15arhebt_u:4493: na hy asau vastvantaraiḥ saṃsṛṣṭasvabhāva ekarūpaḥ /
SA15arhebt_u:4494: tathātve hy abhāvāṃśo 'pi na kvacit sidhyet /
SA15arhebt_u:4495_0: tasyaivaṃvidhasya bhāvasiddhir eva bhāvāṃśasiddhir eva aparasya pratiyogino vastvantarasyābhāvasiddhir
SA15arhebt_u:4495_1: abhāvāṃśasya tvadabhimatasya siddhir astu bhāvāṃśasyaivābhāvāṃśarūpatopapatter iti manyate /
SA15arhebt_u:4496: tathā hi -- abhāvāṃśo 'pi pararūpāsaṃsṛṣṭatayaivābhāva iti vyapadiśyate,
SA15arhebt_u:4498: sā ca bhāvāṃśasyāpi samāneti sa evābhāvo 'stu tannimittasya samānatvāt kim anyenābhāvāṃśopagatena? /

SA15arhebt_u:4541: ity ata āha -- tasya tadanyabhāvasya pradeśalakṣaṇasya tasmād anyena pratiṣedhyena ghaṭādinā asaṃsṛṣṭarūpasya rahitātmanaḥ kevalasya pratiṣedhyena śūnyātmanaḥ /

SA15arhebt_u:4683_0: siddhāntavādī tu sādhyadharmalakṣaṇasya liṅgino ghaṭābhāvākhyasyānyabhāvena liṅgena
SA15arhebt_u:4683_1: sambandhābhāvaḥ prāg ukto na dharmiṇā tataḥ kvadam uttaraṃ saṃbadhyata iti manyamāno
SA15arhebt_u:4683_2: dharmiṇā 'py anyabhāvākhyasya liṅgasya sambandhābhāvaṃ darśayann āha -- na liṅgaliṅginor
SA15arhebt_u:4685: kin tu liṅgaliṅginor asambandha evāsamudāyasādhanam eva ca evam api bruvataḥ /
SA15arhebt_u:4688_0: etad eva [S. 176b.] darśayati -- yatraiva hi pradeśādau dharmitayā tvayā kalpyamāne
SA15arhebt_u:4688_1: yad [T. 339a.] ghaṭādikaṃ nāstīty ucyate lokena sa eva pradeśādis tena ghaṭādinā
SA15arhebt_u:4688_2: 'saṃsṛṣṭas saṃsargarahitaḥ anyabhāvo liṅgatayeṣṭo nāparaḥ kaścit yataḥ taddarśanād
SA15arhebt_u:4688_3: eva ghaṭāsaṃsṛṣṭapradeśādidarśanād evāsya pratipattuḥ `ghaṭo nāsti` iti vikalpo liṅgijñānatayopagato
SA15arhebt_u:4691: yad eva hi dṛśyamānaṃ liṅgijñānaṃ janayati tad eva liṅgam ucyate /
SA15arhebt_u:4694: tataḥ kathaṃ tasyaivānyabhāvasya vyāvṛttito 'pi bhedam ananubhavato liṅgaliṅgibhāvo liṅgatvaṃ liṅgitvaṃ vā? /
SA15arhebt_u:4695: na hi liṅgam eva dharmī bhavitum arhati,
SA15arhebt_u:4697: tataś cānyasya dharmiṇo 'bhāvāt katham anyabhāvātmano liṅgasya tatsambandhaḥ, samudāyasādhyatā vā? /
SA15arhebt_u:4698: śabdakṛtakatvayos tu paramārthatas tādātmye 'pi vyāvṛttibhedanibandhano 'sty eva bhedaḥ /
SA15arhebt_u:4699: tataḥ śabdādidharmipratipattāv apy anityatvādyapratītau kṛtakatvādinā tat sādhyata iti yuktam /
SA15arhebt_u:4700: syān matam -- sāmānyaviśeṣakalpanayā [S. 176b.] liṅgaliṅgitaikasyāpi bhaviṣyatīty ata āha -- na cātra prakṛte 'nyabhāve sāmānyaviśeṣabhāvakalpanāsambhavati,
SA15arhebt_u:4701: yena [T. 339b.] sāmānyaviśeṣavikalpena sāmānyaṃ hetur bhaved viśeṣo dharmī,
SA15arhebt_u:4702: yataḥ {p. 186.1} samudāyasādhyatā liṅgaliṅginoḥ sambandho vā syāt /
SA15arhebt_u:4703: kuto na sambhavatīty āha -- tadviśeṣapratipatter eva ghaṭaviviktapradeśaviśeṣapratipatter eva tadabhāvasya ghaṭābhāvasya pratīteḥ /
SA15arhebt_u:4704: yataś ca viśeṣa eva ghaṭābhāvapratītinibandhanaṃ tataḥ kiṃ tatra sāmānyakalpanayā kriyata iti /
SA15arhebt_u:4705: sa eva viśeṣo 'nyatra varttamānaḥ sāmānyarūpatāṃ pratipatsyata iti cet,
SA15arhebt_u:4706: āha -- tasya ghaṭaviviktapradeśaviśeṣasya anyatra sajātīye anvayasya anuvṛtter abhāvāt kutaḥ sāmānyātmatā? /
SA15arhebt_u:4707: na hy asau deśakālāvasthāniyato viśeṣo 'nyam anvetīti /
SA15arhebt_u:4712: tadā pratijñāyā yo 'rtho dharmadharmisamudāyas tadekadeśa eva dharmilakṣaṇo hetuḥ syāt,
SA15arhebt_u:4715: atha mā bhūt [S. 177a.] eṣa doṣa iti na ghaṭavivikta eva pradeśaviśeṣo hetur iṣyate,
SA15arhebt_u:4716: kin tu pradeśamātraṃ ghaṭaviviktatāviśeṣarahitam ity ata āha -- na ca yatra pradeśamātraṃtatra ghaṭābhāvaḥ /
SA15arhebt_u:4717: saghaṭe 'pi pradeśe pradeśamātrasya bhāvād anaikāntiko hetuḥ syāt /
SA15arhebt_u:4719: yādṛśo ghaṭaviviktaḥ kevalaḥ pradeśo 'grataḥ sthitas tādṛśe sarvatra pradeśe ghaṭasyābhāva iti kuto 'nekāntaḥ? /
SA15arhebt_u:4720: tathāvidhapradeśaviśeṣapratītir eva ghaṭābhāvapratītis tato 'nyabhāvatadabhāvayoḥ liṅgaliṅgitā 'nupapannety upadarśayann āha -- nanu tasyaiva ityādi /
SA15arhebt_u:4721: yo 'sau kevalaḥ pradeśaviśeṣo dharmitayā 'vasthāpitas tasyaiva yat kaivalyaṃ kevala ity anena viśeṣaṇenocyate bhavatā,
SA15arhebt_u:4722: tad eva ghaṭaviraho ghaṭābhāva iti kathyate /
SA15arhebt_u:4723: sa ca ghaṭaviraho liṅgabhūtasya kevalasya pradeśasya 1pratipattāv eva[683]siddho na tūttarakālaṃ tato 'nya eva ākārāntareṇa dhūmādivāgniḥ[684]sidhyati /
SA15arhebt_u:4724: tataḥ kasyedānīṃ tatpratipattāv eva sādhyapratītau satyāṃ talliṅgam[685]? /
SA15arhebt_u:4726: jijñāsitasya ghaṭābhāvasya siddher anyasya kasyacid ajijñāsitatvāt /
SA15arhebt_u:4728: ca yad etad uttarakālaṃ `yatra yatra kevalaḥ pradeśas tatra tatra ghaṭavirahaḥ` iti [S. 177b.] anvayasyānugamāmanu(gamanam anu)
SA15arhebt_u:4729: saraṇam, tac ca nirarthakam ādāv eva sādhyapratīteḥ /
SA15arhebt_u:4730: yata evaṃ tasmād anyabhāvaḥ kevalapradeśalakṣaṇaḥ sādhyasādhanayor bhedābhāvān na sādhanam abhāvasyeti sthitam /
SA15arhebt_u:4731_0: tad evaṃ [T. 340b.] samudāyasādhyatāṃ 3liṅgasya ca dharmiṇā sambandhaṃ[686]pratipādayituṃ
SA15arhebt_u:4731_1: yad uktaṃ pareṇa -- `pradeśādidharmiviśeṣaṇasyābhāvasya sādhanāt`[687]iti tadapṛthaksiddhidūṣaṇenaiva nirākṛtam /
SA15arhebt_u:4732: viṣayaviṣayibhāvena tu sambandhapratipādane niraste paro 'nyathā sambandhaṃ sādhyasādhanayor darśayann āha -- asty anyabhāvatadabhāvayoḥ sambandho virodhākhyaḥ /
SA15arhebt_u:4733: tataḥ sambandhasadbhāvād anyabhāvād abhāvasya siddhir bhaviṣyatīti /
SA15arhebt_u:4734: siddhāntavādī tu sādhyasādhanayor virodham evāsambhāvayan pṛcchati -- kena kasya virodhaḥ iti /
SA15arhebt_u:4735: na hy atra sādhyasādhanayor virodhaḥ saṃbhavatīty abhiprāyaḥ /
SA15arhebt_u:4736: paro virodham abhiprāyānabhijñātayā darśayati -- anyabhāvena kevalapradeśātmanā pratiyogino yasyābhāvaḥ pramātum iṣṭo ghaṭādes tasyeti /
SA15arhebt_u:4737: parasyaivaṃvādino asambandhābhidhāyitām ādarśayann āha -- kiṃnu vai pratiyogī ghaṭādiḥ pramātum iṣṭo yena pratiyogināḥ prameyatvena liṅgaliṅginor virodhaḥ sambandho 'bhidhīyate? /
SA15arhebt_u:4738: naiva pratiyogī pramātum iṣṭaḥ kin tu tadabhāva iti cet,
SA15arhebt_u:4740: [kumārilas tu manyate bhāvāṃśād bhinno '] [S. 179a.] yam abhāvāṃśas tato nānyabhāva eva tadabhāva iti kathaṃ tatpratipattir eva tadabhāvapratipattir iti /
SA15arhebt_u:4742: na cāvastuno bhedaḥ sambhavati ato 'yaṃ vasturūpa eva / yad āha --
SA15arhebt_u:4743: na cāvastuna ete syur bhedās tenāsya vastutā//
SA15arhebt_u:4751: tat kathaṃ tatpratipattir evāparasya vyavacchedanam iti tannirāsārtham āha /
SA15arhebt_u:4752_0: tasyānyasya pradeśasya [T. 342a.] kevalasya yat tat kaivalyam ekākitvam asahāyatā
SA15arhebt_u:4752_1: tad eva aparasya pratiyogino ghaṭādeḥ vaikalyam abhāva iti tasmāt tadanyabhāva eva
SA15arhebt_u:4752_2: bhāvāṃśa eva tvad abhimataḥ tadabhāvaḥpratiyogyabhāvāṃśo na tataḥ pṛthagbhūtaṃ dharmāntaram
SA15arhebt_u:4753: tataś ca tatpratipattir eva ca tasyānyabhāvasya pratipattir eva 5ca tadapratipattiḥ[688] tasya pratiyogino 'pratipattir abhāvapratipattir iti yāvat /
SA15arhebt_u:4754: evaṃ manyate -- yo 'yam abhāvāṃśo bhāvāṃśāt pṛthagbhūto vastuno dharmaḥ parikalpyate sa ghaṭādyabhāvātmakatāṃ [S. 179a.] tadrūpavaikalyād evānubhavati nānyathā /
SA15arhebt_u:4758: na hi yad yadrūpavikalaṃ na bhavati tat tato 'nyatvam anubhavati,
SA15arhebt_u:4761: sarvaṃ ca viśvam ekaṃ dravyaṃ prasajyeta,
SA15arhebt_u:4763: sarvasya ca sarvatropayogaḥ syād ity avaśyam anyavastuno bhāvarūpatā tadanyābhāvātmikaiva /
SA15arhebt_u:4765: tatsaṃyoga eva cendriyasya tadanyabhāvābhāvasaṃyoga [T. 342b.] iti kim ucyate --
SA15arhebt_u:4769: pratyakṣeṇa tadākārotpattyā tadanyābhāvātmake[690]eva vasturūpe pratipanne pāścāt yasya {p. 189.1} yathāgṛhītābhilāpino vikalpasyopagamāt /
SA15arhebt_u:4770: vistarataś cāyam abhāvavicāraḥpramāṇadvitvasiddhāv abhāvaṃ prameyaṃ pramāṇaṃ ca vicārayatā vihita iti tata evāvadhārya iti /
SA15arhebt_u:4773_1: darśayann āha -- anyathā yadi tatpratipattir eva tadabhāvapratipattir iti neṣyate[691]tadā
SA15arhebt_u:4773_2: tasya anyavastunaḥ svarūpaparicchedena tato 'nyasyātadrūpasya avyavacchede anirākaraṇe
SA15arhebt_u:4773_3: tadabhāvāpratipattau tatpariccheda eva na syāt -- tasya tadanyavastunaḥ svarūpapratipattir eva na syāt /
SA15arhebt_u:4775_0: tadatadrūpayoḥ tasya tadanyavastuno yadrūpaṃ pratiniyataṃ sakalatrailokyavilakṣaṇaṃ
SA15arhebt_u:4775_1: yac cātadrūpaṃ tadrūpaṃ na bhavati pararūpaṃ tayoḥ avivekād avivecanād vivekenāvyavasthāpanād
SA15arhebt_u:4776: sakalapararūpāsaṅkīrṇaṃ hi tadrūpam tac cet [T. 343a.] tatsāmarthyabhāvinā pratyakṣeṇa tathā nānukṛtaṃ kevalaṃ sammugdhākāram[692]eva tadutpannaṃ tadā kathan tena tatparicchedaḥ
SA15arhebt_u:4778: na hi yadrūpaṃ yadvastu tadrūpānanukāriṇā jñānena tatparicchedo yukto yathā -- śuklaśaṅkharūpānanukāriṇā kāmalinaḥ pītaśaṅkhāvabhāsinā jñāneneti /
SA15arhebt_u:4779: pratiniyatarūpānukāre vā tatparicchedasya katham anyā 'vyavacchedo nāma? /
SA15arhebt_u:4783_0: ity ata āha -- ya eṣa vyavahāraḥ sarvajanapratītaḥ kasyacid agnyāder vastuno darśanāt
SA15arhebt_u:4783_1: kvaciddeśe tatsambandhini [S. 180b.] prāptyartho dṛṣṭasyādṛṣṭasya ca parihārārthaḥpravṛttinivṛttilakṣaṇaḥ sa na syāt /
SA15arhebt_u:4785: na hi yasmād ayaṃpratipattā analaṃpaśyann api saṅkīrṇatadatadrūpapratibhāsinā pratyakṣeṇa,
SA15arhebt_u:4787: tathā hi -- asaṅkīrṇasyādarśane saṅkīrṇam api yadi na paśyet tadā loṣṭādiprakhyaṃ kathaṃ kasyacid etaddarśanaṃ syāt? /
SA15arhebt_u:4788: sa evaṃbhūtaḥ saṅkīrṇadarśanavān {p. 190.1} pratipattā katham analam eva paśyati na salilādikam? /
SA15arhebt_u:4789: kin tu saṅkīrṇarūpavastupratibhāsijñānatayā salilādikam api paśyati /
SA15arhebt_u:4790: tataḥ kathaṃ salilārthītatra agnimati pradeśe na pravarteta? /
SA15arhebt_u:4793: yas tu salilābhāvaḥ sa tatra salilasyānupalambhena /
SA15arhebt_u:4794: tato jñānadvayena tadatadrūpayor vivekāl loke pravṛttinivṛttilakṣaṇaḥ pratiniyato vyavahāraḥ sidhyatīti /
SA15arhebt_u:4795: siddhāntavādy āha -- ko 'yam anupalambho nāma iti /
SA15arhebt_u:4796: kadācit paro brūyāt salilopalambhavirahamātram ity ata āha -- yadi salila ity ādi /
SA15arhebt_u:4797: kumārilasya tu salilopalambhanivṛttimātraṃ tuccharūpam abhāvapramāṇatayā nābhimatam eva /
SA15arhebt_u:4801: kin tu yo 'bhāvātmanaḥ pratiṣedhyavastupratibhāsijñānātmanā 'pariṇāmaḥ sa tadanyavastupratibhāsijñānasahacarito 'bhyupagantavyo na kevala iti param abhyupagamayitum asyopanyāsaḥ /
SA15arhebt_u:4804: na ca tadanyavastuvijñānapariṇāmād anya eva tasyāpariṇāmo nāma bhavato 'bhimato bhāvāntarasyaivābhāvatvenopagatatvāt /
SA15arhebt_u:4805: tulyayogyatārūpasyaikajñānasaṃsarggiṇa eva cānyavastuno vijñānaṃ tathopeyaṃ nānyasya,
SA15arhebt_u:4807: na hi rūpajñānād rasādyabhāvapratītir yuktamatī [T. 344a.] deśādiviprakarṣavato vā /
SA15arhebt_u:4809: rūpāntarāvabhāsitve hi tasya salilopalambhābhāva eva na sidhyet /
SA15arhebt_u:4811: tadabhāvavyavahāre tv asmadabhimataivānupalabdhir āyāteti pratipādayitum asyopanyāsaḥ /
SA15arhebt_u:4813: [S. 181b.] tuccharūpo 'nupalambhas tadā katham {p. 191.1} abhāvaḥ kasyacit pratipattiḥ pariccheda iti yāvat,
SA15arhebt_u:4815: atha na tasya pratipattirūpateṣyate kin tu taddhetubhāva ity āha -- pratipattihetur vā iti /
SA15arhebt_u:4816: na hi sarvasāmarthyavirahalakṣaṇasyābhāvasya pratipattiṃ prati hetubhāvo yuktaḥ /
SA15arhebt_u:4817: hetubhāve vā tasyānapekṣitasahakāriṇo nityaṃ tajjñānajananād abhāvajñānam evaikaṃ pratipattuḥ syāt,
SA15arhebt_u:4819: na cājñātasyāsya nāstitājñānajananaṃ yuktam ity āha -- tasyāpi salilopalambhābhāvasya kathaṃ pratipattiḥ? /
SA15arhebt_u:4820: athāyaṃ salilopalambhābhāvaḥ svayam apratīta eva salilābhāvapratītiṃ janayati tadā kasyacid api /
SA15arhebt_u:4821: tad evāha -- tasya salilopalambhābhāvasya tato vā salilād anyasyānalādeḥ `vijñānaṃ vā 'nyavastuni` ity ata ātmano 'pariṇāmasya pṛthag avasthāpanāt,
SA15arhebt_u:4822: tatrāpi tadaṅgīkaraṇe cātmano 'pariṇāmasya [T. 344b.] tadātmakatvān na tato bhedena vyavasthāpyeta /
SA15arhebt_u:4823: tataś ca kasyacid api [S. 182a.] tasya tadanyasya vā 'pratipattāv api yady abhāvaḥ salilādeḥ pratīyate tadā svāpādyavasthāsv api salilādyabhāvaḥ kiṃ na pratīyate? /
SA15arhebt_u:4824: tadāpi tadabhāvaḥ pratīyetety etadvicāritampramāṇaviniścaye, tata evāvadhāraṇīyam /
SA15arhebt_u:4825: vyavadhānādigrahaṇena caitaddarśayaty anyavastuno 'pi anyatvaṃ tattulyayogyatārūpāpekṣam eva,
SA15arhebt_u:4827: tathā cāsmad upavarṇitānupalabdhisiddhir iti / yadā caivam uktena
SA15arhebt_u:4828_0: prakāreṇānupalambhena salilābhāvapratītir na yujyate 'nalapratibhāsinaś ca jñānasya
SA15arhebt_u:4828_1: pratiniyatākāratā nābhyupagamyate tasmād ayam analadarśī pratipattā 'nalaṃ paśyann
SA15arhebt_u:4828_2: api saṅkīrṇarūpapratibhāsinā jñānena `analo 'yaṃ na salilam` iti nādhyavasyati anadhyavasyaṃś
SA15arhebt_u:4828_3: ca salilarūpasyāpi pratibhāsanāt tadarthī na tiṣṭhet pravarteta nāpi pratiṣṭheta
SA15arhebt_u:4829: tathā hi -- salilaṃ nāma tad ucyate yat sarvodanyāsantāpādyapanayanakṣamaṃ[694]sakalatadanyarūpāsaṅkīrṇapratiniyatākārajñānāvabhāsi /
SA15arhebt_u:4830: idaṃ tv anyad eva śabalarūpaṃ kim apy avabhāsata iti /
SA15arhebt_u:4831: {p. 192.1} tataśca pravṛttinivṛttiyor viruddhayor yugapad anuṣṭhātum aśakyatvāt dustaraṃvyasanaṃpratipattuḥsyāt /
SA15arhebt_u:4832: atra parasya [S. 182b.] vacanāvakāśam āśaṅkyāha -- tata eva ityādi /
SA15arhebt_u:4833: na mayā [T. 345a.] salilopalambhanivṛttimātrāt tuccharūpāt tadabhāvagatir ucyate,
SA15arhebt_u:4835: kin tu yad etad ekasya kevalasyānalasya darśanaṃ tata evānyasya tatrāpratibhāsamānasya salilasyābhāvagatir bhavati `vijñānaṃ vā 'nyavastuni` iti vacanāt /
SA15arhebt_u:4838: tathā hi -- tasmin dṛśyamāne tadevāstīty avagacchatu, tadanyat tu nāstīti kim iti pratyetīti /
SA15arhebt_u:4839: tasyaiva paridṛśyamānasyānalādeḥ kevalasya salilāsaṃsṛṣṭarūpasya darśanād analajñāne pratibhāsanāt `salilaṃ nāsti` iti niścayaḥ sañjāyate /
SA15arhebt_u:4840: tathā hi -- anala iva salilam api yadi tatrābhāviṣyat tadapy analavad darśane pratyabhāsiṣyata tayoḥ svajñānaṃ pratyaviśiṣṭatvād yogyatāyā naikasya pratibhāso yuktaḥ /
SA15arhebt_u:4841: tasmād ekapratibhāsanam anyābhāvanāntarīyakaṃ ity anyābhāve tato jñānam utpadyate anyavastuni ca vijñānaṃ nāstīti jñānaṃ janayati /
SA15arhebt_u:4843: tadrūpatayaiva[695]ca tajjñānam anyat[696]pratiyad evaṃ vyapadiśyate 'nyathā[697]tadayogād[698]ity anyapratipattir eva tadabhāvavikalpahetur iti siddhāntavādy āha
SA15arhebt_u:4845: nanv asmābhir idam eva prāg abhihitaṃ tayoḥsatoḥnaikarūpaniyatāpratipattiḥ asambhavāt[699] ity ādibhir vacanaiḥ /
SA15arhebt_u:4846: tato yad evānyāsaṃsarggiṇaḥ kevalasya [T. 345b.] pratibhāsanaṃ tad eva tadanyābhāvasyāpi,
SA15arhebt_u:4847: tasyaiva kevalasya tadanyābhāvātmakatvād anyasya cābhāvāṃśasya nirastatvāt /
SA15arhebt_u:4848: tataḥ pratyakṣāvabhāsitatvāt tadabhāvasya tadbalāt pāścātyaṃ vyavahārapravartanarūpaṃ nāstitājñānaṃ {p. 193.1} vikalpakam ājāyate /
SA15arhebt_u:4850: yatas tadanyavastuni vijñānaṃ pratyakṣātmakam apy anavagate tadanyābhāve jñānaṃ janayat pṛthag abhāvapramāṇatayā vyavasthāpyeta /
SA15arhebt_u:4851: tathā hi -- tadanyākāraśūnya eva tadekajñānākāraḥ saṃvedyate /
SA15arhebt_u:4853: na hi vikalpajñānasyāpi tadākāraśūnyarūpasaṃvedanād anyat tadabhāvasaṃvedanaṃ nāma /
SA15arhebt_u:4856: anale `analo 'trāsti` iti pāścātyo vikalpo vyavahārapravartanamātraṃ na tataḥ pṛthak pramāṇaṃ yathoktaṃ prāk,
SA15arhebt_u:4857: tathā nāstitājñānam api vikalpakaṃ tatphaladvāreṇa vā 'nyavastuvijñānaṃ na pratyakṣāt pṛthag abhāvākhyaṃ [S. 183b.] pramāṇam iti /

SA15arhebt_u:5168: liṅgasya kāraṇavyāpakānupalabdhilakṣaṇasya tadabhāvalakṣaṇasya vā aniścayāt tadanupalabdhyoḥ sandeharūpatvāt tadabhāvasya ca [T. 354b.] sandigdhatvāt /
SA15arhebt_u:5169: kathaṃ tarhi tadā 'nayoḥ prayoga iṣyate? ity āha -- kevalam ityādi /

SA15arhebt_u:5172: taddvāreṇa pratibandhaprasādhake pramāṇe smṛtiḥ kathaṃ nāma

SA15arhebt_u:5200: kāni punaḥ ṣaḍrūpāṇi hetos tair iṣyaṃte? ity āha -- trīṇi caitāni pakṣadharmānvayavyatirekākhyāni /
SA15arhebt_u:5202: abādhitaḥ pramāṇenānirākṛto viṣayaḥ sādhyadharmalakṣaṇo yasya sa tathoktaḥ tasya bhāvaḥ tattvam aparaṃ rūpam /
SA15arhebt_u:5204: ekā saṃkhyā yasya {p. 206.1} hetudravyasya tadekasaṃkhyaṃ vivakṣitam ekasaṃkhyaṃ hetudravyam āśrayatvena yasya hetusāmānyasya tadvivakṣitaikasaṃkhyaṃ tadbhāvo 'paraṃ rūpam /
SA15arhebt_u:5205: yady ekasaṃkhyāvyavacchinnāyāṃ pratiheturahitāyāṃ hetuvyaktau hetutvaṃ bhavati tadā gamakatvaṃ na tu pratihetusahitāyām api 1dvisaṃkhyāyuktāyām iti[728]/

SA15arhebt_u:5229: tataḥ [S. 196-7a.] kuto bādhā 'vinābhāvayor virodho 'nyatra bādhayā sādhyadharmābhāvasādhanād anyatra ca hetunā tadbhāvasādhanāt /

SA15arhebt_u:5236: na hy 'mbhastvasya[730]samudre[731]lavaṇatvenāvinābhave 'pi tadvyatirikte 'mbhasi lavaṇatayā sādhyatveneṣṭe 'mbhastvabhāve 'pi lavaṇatvasiddhir iti /

SA15arhebt_u:5244_1: sādhyasiddher abhāvāt tatsiddhaye rūpāntaram abādhitaviṣayatvam ucyate tadā hetor

SA15arhebt_u:5254_0: yadi bādhakaṃ pramāṇaṃ varttate tadā tena sādhyābhāvasya dharmiṇi sādhanāt punar
SA15arhebt_u:5254_1: brahnaṇāpi tadbhāvasya karttum aśakyatvāt kim aṅga 3punaḥ śaṣṭhena hetuneti[732]kutaḥ

SA15arhebt_u:5256_0: atha bādhakapramāṇavṛttau sādhyābhāvo na niyataḥ tadabhāve 'pibhāvād iti dvitīyaḥ
SA15arhebt_u:5256_1: pakṣa iṣyate tad apy abādhāyāḥ sāmarthyaviraha iti darśayann āha -- aniyame bādhakapramāṇavṛttau
SA15arhebt_u:5257: na ca -- bādhakaṃ pramāṇaṃ syāt sādhyābhāvasya ca sambhavaḥ iti na sādhyasādhane sāmarthyam abādhāyāḥ satyām api sādhyābhāvasya smbhavād iti tadyogino 'pi hetvābhāsataiveti /
SA15arhebt_u:5258: yad uktam -- abādhayaiva sādhyasiddher vyartho hetuḥ iti tatrānyathārtham abādhāyā darśayan hetusāmarthyaṃ pratipādayann āhaparaḥ-- na bādhāyā abhāvo samābādhā 'bhimatā /
SA15arhebt_u:5261: sā ca tadanupalabdhiḥ puruṣasya śaktivaikalyāt kvacid deśādau bādhāyā sambhave 'pi syāt /
SA15arhebt_u:5262_1: hetur abhidhānīya iti sa hetuprayogasya viṣayaḥ. tadā hi hetuḥ svasādhyaṃ sādhayan
SA15arhebt_u:5263_0: siddhāntavādy āha -- kiṃ nu vai hetur bādhāyā yā upalabdhis tasyāḥ bibheti na punar
SA15arhebt_u:5263_1: bbādhāyā yena bādhāṃ sambhavantīm apy anādṛtya tadanupalabdhau satyāṃ prayoktavya iṣṭo bhavataḥ /
SA15arhebt_u:5264: kadācitparo brūyāt -- kiṃ kariṣyati vidyamānā'pi bādhā tapasvinī,
SA15arhebt_u:5266: tasmāt tata eva hetor bhayaṃ tadabhāve hetuḥ prayoktavya evety ata āha -- sa tarhi ityādi /
SA15arhebt_u:5267: evaṃ tarhi paramārthena bādhā kim asti nāstīty etadanapekṣya bādhāyā anupalabdhau satyāṃ prayoktavya iti kākvā pṛcchati /
SA15arhebt_u:5268: kadācit paro brūyāt -- uktam evaitat kim arthaṃ pṛccyate? ity āha -- kim arthaṃprayujyata iti /
SA15arhebt_u:5270: paro 'navagatābhiprāya āha -- sādhyasiddhyartham iti bādhakapratyayābhāve prāmāṇyasyeṣṭatvāt tataḥ sādhyasiddhir avirūddhaiveti manyate /
SA15arhebt_u:5271: siddhāntavādī satyāṃ bādhāyāṃ tadanupalambhe 'pi sādhyasiddhim asambhāvayan pṛcchati sa kiṃkvacid ityādi /
SA15arhebt_u:5272: kiṃ [S. 199a.] punar asau hetuḥ satyām api bādhāyāṃ sādhyaṃ sādhayed iti sambhavyate bhavatā yenāsyā bādhāyā abhāva viniścayaṃ prati yatno na kriyate
SA15arhebt_u:5275: tathā satyām api bādhāyāṃ sādhyasādhanasāmarthyopagame saty abādhitaviṣayatvaṃ na bhavati /
SA15arhebt_u:5277: bādhāyām api satyām asya hetoḥ sāmarthyāt sāmarthyopagamāt /
SA15arhebt_u:5278: tad dhi hetor lakṣaṇam ucyate yena vinā sādhyaṃ na sādhayed iti /
SA15arhebt_u:5280: nābādhitaviṣayatvam ity ata āha -- tathāca ityādi /
SA15arhebt_u:5281: evaṃ sati bādhāyāḥ sadbhāvasambhave 'pi tām abhyupagamya tadanupalambhamātreṇa hetoḥ prayogaḥ prāptaḥ /
SA15arhebt_u:5282_0: yadi hi bādhām abhyupagamya hetuprayogo nābhimataḥ syāt tadā 'nupalambhamātreṇa bādhāyāṃ
SA15arhebt_u:5282_1: saṃśayāt -- satām api keśāñcit kathañcidanupalambhasambhavāt -- saṃśayitasya hetuprayoge
SA15arhebt_u:5283: tasmād yo yatsaṃśaye 'pi pravartate sa tasya bhāvapakṣam abhyupetyaiva pravarttate /
SA15arhebt_u:5284: tathā ca yathā bādhānupalabdhau tām abhyupagamya hetuḥ prayujyate tathā tadupalabdhāv api prayujyatām,
SA15arhebt_u:5285_0: bādhāyāḥ sadbhāvābhyupagame sati tadupalambhānupalambhayor viśeṣābhāvād iti nānupalabhyamānabādhatvam
SA15arhebt_u:5285_1: api [S. 199b.] hetulakṣaṇaṃ yujyata iti kuto bādhakapratyayavirahe 'py asati pratibandhe
SA15arhebt_u:5286: parasya vacanāvakāśam āśaṅkhyāha -- na bādhāyām ityādi /
