SA15arhebt_u:5288: siddhāntavādy āha -- yady evaṃ bādhāyāṃ satyāṃ hetur asamartho yadīṣyate tadā 'nirṇīto adhāyā asaṃbhavo yasya hetoḥ sa tathāvidhaḥ prayogaṃbādhā 'nupalambhamātreṇa nārhati /
SA15arhebt_u:5290: mā bhūd bādhāyāḥ sambhasvapakṣe prayuktasyāpi hetoḥ sādhyasiddhau 1asāmarthyam iti[733]/
SA15arhebt_u:5291_1: avaśyam arthānām asattvād dhetoḥ sāmathyam iti cen manyase siddhāntavādy āha -- kim
SA15arhebt_u:5292: upalambho hy arthānāṃ kāryaṃ, na ca kāryaṃ kāraṇaṃ vyāpnoti /
SA15arhebt_u:5293: na hy 'vaśyaṃ kāraṇāni kāryavanti bhavanti, pratibandhavaikalyasambhavāt[736]/
SA15arhebt_u:5295: nivṛttau bādhāyā nivṛttiḥ?, yato hetor bbādhāyāḥ sambhavakṛtam asāmarthyaṃ na sambhaved iti /
SA15arhebt_u:5297: [S. 200a.] pramāṇatayopagatasyāpy udayakāle 'nupalabdhabādhasya {p. 211.1} kālāntareṇa bādhakapratyayotpāde saty aprāmāṇyopagamāt /
SA15arhebt_u:5300: iti anenaiva nyāyena jñānanivṛttyā bādhānivṛtter ity āha -- tathāpi vyartho hetuḥ /
SA15arhebt_u:5305: tathā hi -- yatra bādhāyā anupalambhas tatra paramārthata eva sā na vidyata iti manyase /
SA15arhebt_u:5308: anyathā paramārthena bādhāyā abhāvāyogāt. tataś ca sādhyadharmasyābhāvābhāve sati bhāva iti bhavanmatya sādhyapratīter vyarthatā hetor iti.
SA15arhebt_u:5309: atha mā bhūd yuktivirodha iti nopalambhanivṛttau bādhānivṛttir iṣyate,
SA15arhebt_u:5310_0: tatrāha -- upalambhasya nivṛttāv api satyāṃ bādhāyā anivṛttāv iṣyamāṇāyāṃ tadavasthaṃ
SA15arhebt_u:5310_1: hetor asāmarthyam yadavasthaṃ bādhopalambha iti hetor aprayoga iti kasyābādhitaviṣayatvaṃ
SA15arhebt_u:5311_0: etad evopasaṃharann āha -- tasmāt svasādhya ityādi. yata evaṃ vyāptya hetoḥ sarvatra
SA15arhebt_u:5311_3: ca bhavan hetur dharmiṇi kiñcit sādhyaṃ na bhāvayati na sādhayati na vibhāvayati
SA15arhebt_u:5311_4: tadviparītaṃ na niṣedhayati iti tasya vidhipratiṣedhāvakurvata upakṣepaḥ prayogo
SA15arhebt_u:5311_5: na samarthaḥ ity avaśyaṃ hetuprayogam icchatā svasādhyāvinābhāvaḥ sarvatra hetor abhyupagantavyaḥ /
SA15arhebt_u:5314: tasmiṃś cābhyupagate bādhāvinābhāvayor virodhaḥ [T. 361a.] siddha ity upasaṃharann āha -- tan na ityādi /
SA15arhebt_u:5315: yata evaṃ tena kāraṇenābādhā rūpāntaraṃ na bhavati /
SA15arhebt_u:5316: yadi nāma bādhāvinābhāvayoḥ sahāvasthānābhāvād avinābhāve {p. 212.1} saty abādhā gamyate rūpāntaraṃ tu kim iti na bhavati?
SA15arhebt_u:5317: iti, ata āha -- tan nāma ityādi /
SA15arhebt_u:5318: tad dhi tasmād viśeṣaṇāntaraṃ bhaved vastusthitayā /
SA15arhebt_u:5319: [S. 201a.] lakṣaṇakāraiś ca rūpāntaratvenopādānam arhati yasya viśeṣaṇasya bhave 'pi yasyāparasyābhāvaḥ syāt /
SA15arhebt_u:5320: yataḥ svabhāve vyabhicāre ca viśeṣaṇaviśeśyabhāvo na sambhava eva kevale /
SA15arhebt_u:5322: saty api hi śrāvaṇatvādeḥ sapakṣe bhāvo nāsti /
SA15arhebt_u:5323: saty api ca cākśuṣatvādeḥ sapakṣe bhāve sādhyadharmiṇi śabde sambandho nāsti /
SA15arhebt_u:5324: tato 'nyoḥ sambavavyabhicārayor bhāvād viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyabhāvo lakṣaṇāntaratvena copādānam[737]/
SA15arhebt_u:5325: ihā 'py evaṃ bhaviṣyatīti ced āha -- na caitad anantaroditam abādhāyā avinābhāve sati sambhavati /
SA15arhebt_u:5326: saty avinābhāve niyamenābādhāyāḥ sambhavād vyabhicārābhāvāt kuto viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyabhāvo
SA15arhebt_u:5328: iti na hetoḥ sādhyāvinābhāvino viruddhasya ca sādhyaviparyayāvinābhāvino viṣaye bādhā sambhavati /
SA15arhebt_u:5329: uktena prakāreṇa viparyaye samyagghetur evāviṣaye tu prayogād dhetvābhāsa ucyate /
SA15arhebt_u:5330: yata evam iti tasmān na tadabhāvo bādhāvirahaḥ [T. 361b.] pṛthagavinābhāvād anvayavyatirekātmano 'nayor hetuviruddhayor lakṣaṇāntaratvena vācyaḥ,
SA15arhebt_u:5332: yataś cāvinābhāve sati bādhā na sambhavati virodhāt,
SA15arhebt_u:5333: tasmād dhetor yathoktalakṣaṇasya prayoge sati gamyārthāyā api pratijñāyā doṣāṇāṃ pratyakṣaviruddhādīnāṃ sambhavo nāsti,
SA15arhebt_u:5335: tat kathaṃ bādhāviraho heto rūpāntaram ucyate?
SA15arhebt_u:5336: asambhavināṃ ca teṣāṃ upavarṇanaṃ niṣphalam 3ity ākūtam[739]/
SA15arhebt_u:5337: kevalāyāḥ prayoge 'sti sambhava iti cet, āha -- nāpi ityādi /
SA15arhebt_u:5338: hetuprayoge hy asati kevalā pratijñaiva na prayujyate, hetuviṣayatvena tadabhyupagamāt /
SA15arhebt_u:5339: tataś caśāstrakārair na pratijñādoṣāḥ pratyakṣaviruddhādayo vācyā iti /
SA15arhebt_u:5340: diṅnāgapādais tu {p. 213.1} sādhyāsādhyaviparyayeṇa[740]vipratipattidarśanād aprayogārhasyāpi pakṣasya lakṣaṇavidhāne nyāyaprāptam evāpakṣatva na ni(-tvaṃ ni)
SA15arhebt_u:5345_0: tad evam abādhitaviṣayatvaṃ nirākṛtya rūpāntaraṃ nirākurvann āha -- etena avinābhāve
SA15arhebt_u:5346: paraḥpṛcchati -- katham iti kena prakāreṇa -- yathā bādhāvinābhāvayoḥ sahānavasthānaṃ tathā pratihetvavinābhāvayor api?
SA15arhebt_u:5351: yadi svasādhyabhāva eva bhavet, anyathā tallakṣaṇam avinābhāvo nāma hīyeta /
SA15arhebt_u:5352: atraiva dharmiṇi sa tallakṣaṇa eko bhavati tatraiva dharmiṇi tasmād anyo 'pi pratihetur viruddhastena hetulakṣaṇayuktaḥ kathaṃ bhavati? /
SA15arhebt_u:5353_0: ekasya 3hetor yat sādhyaṃ[742]tadbādhakasya tadviruddhasyāparasya dharmasya bhāva
SA15arhebt_u:5353_1: eva nābhāve bhāvād avinābhāvād iti bādhayā samānaṃ bādhāsambhavena samānaḥ pratihetur
SA15arhebt_u:5354: atraiva dūṣaṇāntaram abhidhātuṃ vikalpayann āha -- api ca ityādi /
SA15arhebt_u:5355_0: `vastutaḥ` paramārthato yasya pratihetur na sambhavati -- kim asau samyagjñānasya
SA15arhebt_u:5355_1: viparyayasya vopanyastasādhyaviparītajñānasya vā hetur iṣṭo [T. 362b.] yato vivakṣitaikasaṃkhyatvaṃ tallakṣaṇam ucyate,
SA15arhebt_u:5356: āhosvid yasya pratihetus tatsādhyaviparītasādhako na pradarśitaḥ paramārthataḥ sann apīti /
SA15arhebt_u:5357: paro doṣam apaśyann āha -- kiñcataḥ ityādi /
SA15arhebt_u:5358: yadi nāma pūrvo vikalpa uttaro vā tataḥ ko doṣaḥ? iti[743]/
SA15arhebt_u:5359: {p. 214.1} siddhāntavādy āha -- yady asambhavan pratihetur yasya sa samyagjñānādihetur iṣyate,
SA15arhebt_u:5361: kasmāt? aśakyo niścayo yasya vastuto 'sambhavat pratihetutvasya sa tathoktaḥ /
SA15arhebt_u:5363: paro hi darśanādarśanābhyām asaty api pratibandhe 'vinābhāvam icchati /
SA15arhebt_u:5364: paro hi darśanādarśanābhyām asaty api pratibandhe 'vinābhāvam icchati /
SA15arhebt_u:5366: sa cānupalabhyamāno 'pi kadācit syād iti vastutas tadabhāvo niścīyate /
SA15arhebt_u:5367: pratibandhanibandhanāvinābhāvavādināṃ tv asmākaṃ [S. 203a.] pratihetvasambhavaḥ suniścita eva /
SA15arhebt_u:5368_0: na hi tādātmyatadutpattilakṣaṇe pratibandhe pramāṇataḥ siddhe tannimittāvinābhāvitayā
SA15arhebt_u:5368_1: ekena hetuna svasādhye sādhite punas tatraiva dharmiṇi tallakṣaṇasya [T. 363a.] tadviruddhārthasādhakasya
SA15arhebt_u:5371: svasādhyāvinābhāvinaḥ prathamasya tatra pramāṇato bhāvasiddhyayogād iti /
SA15arhebt_u:5372: syān matam -- yadi nāma prastutaḥ pratihetvasambhavo 'smābhir niścetum aśakyas tathāpy asambhavat pratihetutvaṃ vivakṣittaikasaṃkhyatvapratipāditaṃ hetulakṣaṇaṃ kasmān na bhavati?
SA15arhebt_u:5373: ity āha -- na hy aniścitātmanaḥ ityādi /
SA15arhebt_u:5374: pratipādako yo dharmo hetos tasyāniścitasvabhāvasya yasmāt tallakṣaṇatvaṃ pratipādakadharmatā na bhavati /
SA15arhebt_u:5376: nāpi sandigdhaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ yasya sa hetur bhavatīti na kaściddhetur bhaved iti hetvabhāvo [S. 203b.] vā ity asya samarthanam /
SA15arhebt_u:5377: tataś ca hetvābhāsās tato 'pi ity atrāpi yojitam iti /
SA15arhebt_u:5378: syān matam -- yasya pratiyogī dṛśyate tasyaiva pratihetubhāvāt ahetutvaṃ bhavatu,
SA15arhebt_u:5379: yasya tu pratiyogī hetur na dṛśyate sa vastuta evāsambhavat pratihetuḥ /
SA15arhebt_u:5380: na hi tatra vastutaḥ pratihetusambhavaḥ śaṅkyate,
SA15arhebt_u:5381: bādhakapratyayam antareṇa bādhāśaṅkāyā ayogāt / tad uktam --
SA15arhebt_u:5383: {p. 215.1} ata āha -- tulye lakṣaṇe hi ityādi /
SA15arhebt_u:5384_1: tasmin dṛṣṭaḥ pratiyoginaḥ [T. 363b.] pratihetor bbādhakasya sambhava sa yeśām api
SA15arhebt_u:5384_2: tattulyalakṣaṇānāṃ pratiyogī na dṛśyate teṣv api śaṅkāṃ pratihetusambhavaviṣayām utpādayati /
SA15arhebt_u:5387: na hi tasyetareṇa kaścidviśeṣo 'sti, yatas tatsambhavo na śaṅkyeta /
SA15arhebt_u:5388: puruṣaśaktivaikalyādinā tu tadadarśanaṃ[744]sambhāvyeteti kim ucyate `nāśaṅkā niḥpra(ṣpra)māṇikā` iti /
SA15arhebt_u:5389: atha viśeṣaḥ pratibandhalakṣaṇo 'vinābhāvaniścāyako dṛṣṭapratihetor adṛṣṭapratiyogina iṣyate yataḥ pratiyogisambhavāśaṅkā 'stam upaiti /
SA15arhebt_u:5390: [S. 204a.] tadā sati vā viśeṣe sa viśeṣo hetor lakṣaṇam /
SA15arhebt_u:5392: yatas tato viśeṣād dhetur ekāntena niścayena nirastapratipakṣas tathāvidhe dharmiṇi pratihetvasambhavāt
SA15arhebt_u:5394: yas tathāvidho na bhavati tadviśeṣavirahāt dṛṣṭapratihetuḥ so 'tallakṣaṇo na hetuḥ syāt /
SA15arhebt_u:5395: tathā ca yadi nāmā 'hetau pratihetur dṛṣṭo,
SA15arhebt_u:5398: yathoktāvinābhāvavacanenaiva tannivṛtter ity āha -- tathāca hetau tadviśeṣayogini pratihetvasambhave sati vyarthā niṣprayojanam ekasaṃkhyāvivakṣeti /
SA15arhebt_u:5399: [T. 364a.] yathoktaviśeṣāṅgīkaraṇe tallakṣaṇasya pratihetor asambhavāt kasyaikasaṃkhyāvivakṣayā vyavacchedaḥ kriyate?
SA15arhebt_u:5401: viruddhāvyabhicāriṇaś ca hetvābhāsasya vyavacchedārtham ekasaṃkhyāvivakṣā hetulakṣaṇe kriyate /
SA15arhebt_u:5402: vastuto 'sambhavat pratihetutvasiddhye ca pratibandhalakṣaṇe viśeṣe hetāv iṣyamāṇe viruddhāvyabhicāry api hetvābhāso na [S. 204b.] bhavati /
SA15arhebt_u:5404: iti darśayann āha -- ataḥ pratibandhalakṣaṇaviśeṣopagamāt viruddhāvyabhicāriṇo hetvābhāsasya yallakṣaṇaṃtad dhīyeta na sambhavet /
SA15arhebt_u:5405: kiṃ punas tadviruddhāvyabhicāriṇo lakṣaṇam? ity āha -- svalakṣaṇa ityādi /
SA15arhebt_u:5406_0: hetor yadātmīyaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ tadyuktayor hetvor {p. 216.1}ekatra dharmiṇi virodhena
SA15arhebt_u:5407: na ca tat pratibandhāṅgīkaraṇe sati sambhavati /
SA15arhebt_u:5408: na hi tādātmyatadutpattibhyāṃ svasādhyapratibandhavaty ekatra hetau kvaciddharmiṇi saṃbhavati dvitīyas tallakṣaṇas tatraiva hetuḥ sambhavet,
SA15arhebt_u:5410: tadavyabhicāriṇo hetor dvitīyasya tatra kutaḥ sambhavāvakāśa iti /
SA15arhebt_u:5411: nanu yadi tathāvidhaviśeṣasambhave [S. 205a.] sati viruddhāvyabhicārilakṣaṇaṃ hīyate,
SA15arhebt_u:5414: tat kim uktaṃ hetvabhāvo vety ata āha -- na ca naiva tasya viśeṣasya pratibandhalakṣaṇasya,
SA15arhebt_u:5416: svarūpaṃ tādātmyatadutpattilakṣaṇaṃ nirddeśyate bhavadbhiḥ yathā 'smābhir nirdiṣṭaṃ ydrūpaṃ pratītya pratipadya pratiyoginaḥ sambhavāsambhavāu utpaśyāmaḥ /
SA15arhebt_u:5417: yatra sa viśeṣo nāsti tatra pratiyoginaḥ sambhavaḥ kalpita āgamāśraye 'numāne /
SA15arhebt_u:5418_0: yatra tv asti sa viśeṣo vastubalapravṛtte 'numāne tatra pratiyogino 'sambhava iti
SA15arhebt_u:5418_1: yata evaṃ tasmān nāsty eva bhavatāṃ sa viśeṣaḥ -- bhavadbhir na jñāyata eva sa viśeṣa
SA15arhebt_u:5418_2: 1iti -- tasmāt[745]sarvatra yatrāpi pratiyogī na dṛśyate tatrāpi ṣāṅkyā pratiyogiviṣayayā bhavitavyam /
SA15arhebt_u:5421_0: yasyāpi [S. 205b.] hi pratihetur dṛṣṭas tasyāpi prāk pratiyogidarśanād itareṇa sarvakālam

SA15arhebt_u:5421_2: sambhavati nyānyatra` iti darśanādarśanamātranibandhanayor anvayavyatirekayoḥ sarvatra samānatvāt /
SA15arhebt_u:5422: tathāpi paścāt tatra pratiyogī dṛṣṭa iti sarvatra tattulyalakṣaṇe pratiyogisadbhāvaśaṅkā na vivarttata iti /

SA15arhebt_u:5427: na hy asarvadarśinām upalabdhiḥ sarvabhāvasattāṃ vyāpnoti, pratibandhavaikalyasadbhāvāt /

SA15arhebt_u:5437_1: abhihitaṃ `svabhāvahetor viparyaye bādhakapramāṇavaśād ātmyaniścaye saty anvayavyatirekayos tatra nirṇaya;
SA15arhebt_u:5438: [S. 206b.] kāryahetau ca yathoktapratyakṣānupalambhataḥ kāryakāraṇasiddhes tanniścaya` iti /
SA15arhebt_u:5439: yata evaṃ sarvatra pratiyogyāśaṅkā na nivarttate bhavad darśane tena kāraṇāniścayaḥ pratiyoginaḥ sambhavayoḥ `iha pratiyogī sambhavati iha tu na sambhavati` ity evaṃrūpa 4iti
SA15arhebt_u:5440: -- tasmād[748]vastuto 'sambhavat pratihetutvaṃ {p. 218.1} yallakṣaṇam hetoḥ [T. 366a.] tasyāniścitatvād ekasaṃkhyāvivakśāv ādināṃ na kaściddhetuḥ syāt /
SA15arhebt_u:5441: na hy aniścitalakṣaṇo hetur bhavatīty upasaṃhāra iti /
SA15arhebt_u:5442_0: tad evaṃ `kiṃ yo vastuto 'sambhavatpratihetuḥ sa samyagjñānaviparyayahetur iṣṭaḥ`
SA15arhebt_u:5442_1: iti amuṃ vikalpaṃ nirākṛtya dvitīyaṃ vikalpaṃ nirācikīrṣur āha -- athāpradarśitapratihetuḥ
SA15arhebt_u:5443: ayaṃ ca pakṣaḥ kiladiṅnāgācāryasyāpy abhimata iti para upadarśayann āha -- yathāha diṅnāgācāryaḥ /
SA15arhebt_u:5445_0: śrāvaṇatvasya hi na kathañcidvyavacchedahetutvam iti diṅnāgācāryeṇokte pareṇābhihitam
SA15arhebt_u:5446_0: nityaḥśabdaḥśrāvaṇatvātśabdatvavat ity evaṃ pareṇokte satyācāryeṇoktam -- yady atraśabdākhye
SA15arhebt_u:5448: tad evamācāryāpadaiḥ[750]sākṣitve datte mujam utkṣipya śāstrakāraḥ pūtkurvann[751]āha -- 4idam idānīm[752]ityādi /
SA15arhebt_u:5449: 5yadā hyācāryasyāpy[753]etad abhimatam iti [T. 366b.] kaiścidvyākhyāyate tadidaṃ[754]sumahadvyasanam āyatam -- gurubhir abhihitatvād aprakāśyam,
SA15arhebt_u:5450: na hi gurūṇāṃ doṣaḥ prakāśayituṃ yuktaḥ,
SA15arhebt_u:5452: tat kiṃ gurūn[755]dūṣayāma uta 8nyāyam apy upekṣāmahe[756]ity 9ubhayam apy aśakyam[757]iti kaṣṭataraṃvyasanaṃkatham nirvoḍhuṃśakyeta? /
SA15arhebt_u:5454_0: kaḥ punar atra doṣo yenedaṃ kaṣṭataram ity āha -- sa tāvad ayaṃ śrāvaṇatvalakṣaṇo
SA15arhebt_u:5454_1: hetur vastuni śabdādīni 10svasādhyaṃ tattvam[758]nityatvaṃ tatprakṛtīni tadātmakāni
SA15arhebt_u:5455: puruṣāṇāṃmīmāṃsakavaiyākaraṇadīnāṃ tān {p. 219.1} abhyudayena svarggeṇa niḥśreyasena cāpavarggeṇa yojayitvā /
SA15arhebt_u:5456: tathā hi -- vastutattvaṃ yāvan kleśān na prajahāti tāvat svargamāsādayati,
SA15arhebt_u:5458: athavā śabdanityatvapratītau vedaprāmāṇyāt tadvahitāgnihotrānuṣṭhānāt[759]svarggo vedāntaniṣevaṇād apavarggaḥ /
SA15arhebt_u:5459_0: punar uttarakālaṃ pratibhāvatā[760] prajñājātīyenavaiśeṣikādinā puruṣeṇa hetvantarasya[761]
SA15arhebt_u:5459_1: [T. 367a.] pratihetoḥ nidarśanena yad asya nityatvasādhanasāmarthya pratihetvanupadarśane[762]satyāsīt
SA15arhebt_u:5461: tāṃś ca tatpramāṇakān[764]puruṣān svarggāpavarggasampadaḥ pracyāvya śrāvaṇatvalakṣaṇo hetuḥ śaktivaikalyāt paritrātum aśakto bhraṣṭarājya iva rājā tapovanaṃ gacchati
SA15arhebt_u:5462: svair eva duścaritair[765]iti kim atra vayaṃ brūmaḥ? /
SA15arhebt_u:5463: tad evam upahasyaitasmin pakṣe [S. 208a.] doṣam upadarśayann āha -- puruṣapratibhā ityādi /
SA15arhebt_u:5464: yadā hy apradarśitapratihetur hetur iṣyate tadā puruṣapratibhākṛtaṃ sādhanatvam abhyupagataṃ bhavati /
SA15arhebt_u:5465: tataś ca vastuto na kiñcit sādhanam asādhanaṃ vā prāptam /
SA15arhebt_u:5466: tathā hi -- yadā pratihetur nopadarśyate tadā sādhanam,
SA15arhebt_u:5467: yadā tūpadarśyate tadā na sādhanam iti puruṣapratibhākṛtaṃ sādhanatvam āyātam iti /
SA15arhebt_u:5468: api ca -- apradarśitapratihetor hetor hetutve 'ṅgīkriyamāṇe vikalpadvayam -- kiṃ paramārthato hetus taddharmabhāvī,
SA15arhebt_u:5470: tatrādyaṃ vikalpam adhikṛtyāha -- sa ca hetur yo 'sau prathamaṃ upādīyate /
SA15arhebt_u:5471_0: sa yadi svabhāvataḥ eva tasmin sādhyadharme satyeva bhavati ity evaṃśīlo 'smad upavarṇitapratibandhopagamāt
SA15arhebt_u:5471_1: [T. 367b.] yadīṣyate tadākatham anyathākriyeta hetvantareṇātaddharmabhāvī kathaṃ kriyate? /
SA15arhebt_u:5474_0: vastūnāṃ [S. 208b.] hetulakṣaṇānāṃ yaḥ svabhāvaḥ -- `saty eva sādhyadharme bhavanātmakaḥ`
SA15arhebt_u:5474_1: -- tadanyathābhāvasya tadviparyayasya abhāvād ubhayoś ca svasādhyadharmāvinābhāvitve
SA15arhebt_u:5474_2: {p. 220.1} svabhāvata eva dharmiṇy ekatra tayor bhāve viruddāv ubhau svabhāvāv ekasya syātām /
SA15arhebt_u:5475: na caikasya viruddhau svabhāvau sambhavataḥ, viruddhadharmādhyāsena tasyaikatvahāniprasaṅgāt /
SA15arhebt_u:5477: asaty api sādhyadharme bhavanaśīlaḥ pratibandhānabhyupagamāt katham anyadā'pi apradarśitapratihetvavasthāyām api sādhanaṃkasyacit? /
SA15arhebt_u:5478: naiva tadāpi sādhanam, na kevalaṃ pradarśitapratihetvavasthāyām iti /
SA15arhebt_u:5480: yata evaṃ bhāvānāṃ svabhāvo 'nyathā kartuṃ na śakyate,
SA15arhebt_u:5481_0: viruddhobhayasvabhāvaś caiko na sambhavati tasmāt paramārthataḥ svena svena [S. 209.1a.]
SA15arhebt_u:5481_2: kāryasvabhāvalakṣaṇasya pratihetor asambhavād alakṣaṇam ekasaṃkhyāvivakṣā vivakṣitaikasaṃkhyatvaṃ
SA15arhebt_u:5482: kiṃ kāraṇam? ity āha -- vyavacchedyābhāvād iti /
SA15arhebt_u:5484: sa ca pratihetuḥ svalakṣaṇayuktayoḥ kāryasvabhāvayor na bhavaty eveti kathaṃ taddhetulakṣaṇaṃ syād iti /
SA15arhebt_u:5485: tad evam anayor dvayo rūpayor yaḥ sambhavo yathoktāvinābhāvā 'sambhave satīti rūpāntaropagame 'pi hetvābhāsataiveti hetvābhāsās tato 'para iti ity asyārtho vivṛta iti /
SA15arhebt_u:5487_0: abādhitaviṣayatvaṃ vivakṣitaikasaṃkhyatvaṃ ca kāryasvabhāvahetvor evāvinābhāve sati
SA15arhebt_u:5487_1: bādhāpratihetvor asambhavāt vyavacchedyābhāvatvena saty api liṅgadharmatve tallakṣaṇaṃ
SA15arhebt_u:5492: na ca tat liṅgasyātmarūpam iti [T. 368b.] kathaṃ liṅgalakṣaṇaṃ bhaviṣyati? /
SA15arhebt_u:5493: yady api vikalpapratibhāsī sāmanyākāro liṅgatayā 'vasthāpyate tathāpi na jñānasya liṅgadharmatā /
SA15arhebt_u:5494: na hy asau svatantra eva liṅgam /
SA15arhebt_u:5495: yad āha -- vikalpabhedāna {p. 221.1} svatantrāṇām anvarthāśrayaṇāt tatkalpitaviṣayāda[766]'rthapratipattāv[767] anarthapratilambha eva syāt iti /
SA15arhebt_u:5498_0: vastudarśanahāneḥ[768]svalakṣaṇasya kvacidananvayāc ca taddharmatām eva tv anusmaranto
SA15arhebt_u:5498_1: vikalpā nānaikavyatirekān[769]saṃdarśayanto vastuni paramparayā pratibandhād avisaṃvādakāḥ
SA15arhebt_u:5499: na ca tasya kāryāder ātmarūpaṃ [S. 209.2a.] jñātam /
SA15arhebt_u:5500: vikalpāvabhāsī ca sāmānyākāro naiva vikalpasyātmabhūtaḥ, tasya nīrūpasya vasturūpavirodhāt /
SA15arhebt_u:5502: yasmād abāhyāsyāpi bāhyatayā vyavasitasyānanuyāyino 'py anuyāyitayā sāmānyāmakatvaṃ tathātve cāsya vikalparūpatayā kutaḥ? yadā ''ha --
SA15arhebt_u:5507: etad eva sādhayann āha -- kiṃrūpād ityādi /
SA15arhebt_u:5508_0: kim ātmakāt hetor anumeyo 'rtho jñātavyaḥ iti cintāyāṃ prakṛtāyāṃ pratipattuḥ puṃso
SA15arhebt_u:5508_1: yad avisaṃvādakaṃ liṅgaṃ tasya svarūpam abhidhīyate śāstrakāraiḥ [T. 369a.] yasya
SA15arhebt_u:5508_2: rūpasya darśanādayaṃ pratipattā ôyatra tadrūpasambhavaḥ tat sādhanam tadrūpavikalam
SA15arhebt_u:5508_3: asādhanamô iti pravibhāgena vyavasthāpya yat tatra sādhanatvena vyavasthāpitaṃ tasyeṣṭārthasannidhānasampratyayāt
SA15arhebt_u:5510: etasmiṃś ca nyāye [S. 209.2b.] vyavasthite yad asya liṅgasyātmarūpaṃ tal lakṣaṇaṃ bhavitum arhati pakṣadharmādivat na tu yat pararūpam /
SA15arhebt_u:5511: syād etad -- jñātasya liṅgasya sādhakatvād yuktaiva sādhyasiddhyupayogino jñānasya liṅgalakṣaṇatety ata āha -- pratipattijanmani ityādi /
SA15arhebt_u:5512: yady anumeyapratītijanmany upayujyate jñānam iti tanmātreṇa liṅgasya lakṣaṇam iṣyate tadā 'tiprasaṅgaḥ prāpnoti /
SA15arhebt_u:5513_0: tam evāha -- evaṃpratipattijanmany upayogamātrāl liṅgalakṣaṇatve prameyasya arthasya
SA15arhebt_u:5513_1: puruṣasya {p. 222.1} pramātuḥ adi śabdāt saṃyogasamavāyādīnām ālokamanaskārādīnāṃ
SA15arhebt_u:5514: atra kāraṇam āha -- na hi teṣv api prameyādiṣu asatsu liṅgini jñānaṃ bhavatīti kṛtvā /
SA15arhebt_u:5515: atra paro 'niṣṭam āpādayann āha -- niścitagrahaṇaṃtarhi ityādi /
SA15arhebt_u:5516: yadi pararūpatvāj jñānaṃ liṅgalakṣaṇaṃ na bhavati tadā ca yad etadācāryeṇa --
SA15arhebt_u:5519: niścitagrahaṇaṃ kṛtaṃ bhavataś cābhimataṃ [T. 369b.] tan na karttavyam /
SA15arhebt_u:5520: tathā hi -- niścayo hi liṅgasya pararūpam eva /
SA15arhebt_u:5521: sa cet tallakṣaṇam, jñānaṃ kim iti neśyate yato niścayo vijñānam eva tadviśeṣatvād asyeti /
SA15arhebt_u:5522: siddhāntavāy āha -- na na karttavyaṃ kintu kartavyam eva tasya [S. 210a.] niścitagrahaṇasya liṅgarūpapratipādanād anyārthatvāt /
SA15arhebt_u:5523: tām evānyārthatāṃ darśayann āha -- sapakṣavipakṣayoḥ ityādi /
SA15arhebt_u:5524: pare hi sapakṣe darśanamātreṇāsapakṣe cādarśanamātrato gamakaṃ hetum icchanti /
SA15arhebt_u:5525: teṣāṃ naiva darśanamātreṇa sādhyasiddhau samartho hetur bhavatīti jñāpanārthaṃ niścitagrahaṇaṃ kṛtam /
SA15arhebt_u:5526: yataḥ sator vidyamānayor api darśanādarśanayor agamakatvaṃ hetor dṛśyate `sa śyamaḥ,
SA15arhebt_u:5528_0: yata evaṃ tena kāraṇena sapakṣe bhāvena vipakṣe sarvatrābhāvaviśiṣṭenā 'sapakṣe ca
SA15arhebt_u:5528_1: sarvatrābhāvena sapakṣe tādātmyatadutpattilakṣaṇabhāvaviśiṣṭena gamako hetur ity
SA15arhebt_u:5528_2: asyārthasya jñāpanārthaṃ lakṣaṇavākye niścitagrahaṇaṃ kṛtaṃ boddhavyam /
SA15arhebt_u:5529: etad uktaṃ bhavati -- yāv eva sapakṣavipakṣayoḥ bhāvābhāvau pratibandhasādhakapramāṇavṛttyā niścitau tābhyām
SA15arhebt_u:5531: na tu yathākathañciddarśanamātreṇety asyārthasya [S. 210b.] jñāpanāya niścitagrahaṇaṃ kṛtam iti /
SA15arhebt_u:5533: yena viśiṣṭayor bhāvābhāvayor eva khyāpanāya niścitagrahaṇaṃ kṛtam,
SA15arhebt_u:5536: tena pararūpaṃ liṅgasya lakṣaṇaṃ na bhavati /
SA15arhebt_u:5537: yataḥ tena jñānādinā pararūpeṇa liṅgasya na kiñcid rūpaviśeṣo 'bhidhīyata iti /
SA15arhebt_u:5538: {p. 223.1} nanu ca pare 'pi sapakṣavipakṣayor bhāvābhāvābhyāṃ gamakaṃ hetum icchanti,
SA15arhebt_u:5541: iti, ata āha -- tau hi ityādi /
SA15arhebt_u:5542: yady api pare bhāvābhāvābhyām eva gamakaṃ hetum icchanti tathāpi sapakṣa eva bhāvo 'sapakṣe cābhāva eveti bhāvābhāvau darśanādarśanamātrato vyavasthāpayanti /
SA15arhebt_u:5543: na ca tatas tau tathāvidhāu sidhyataḥ,
SA15arhebt_u:5544: pratibandhavikalānām apy athānāṃ kvacid bhāvābhāvayoḥ kathañciddarśanādarśanasambhavāt /
SA15arhebt_u:5545_0: tasmād [S. 211a.] yau `hetoḥ sapakṣe eva bhāvo 'sapakṣe cābhāva eva` ity evam ātmakau
SA15arhebt_u:5545_1: bhāvābhāvau tau tadbhāvasya sādhakaṃ yat pramāṇaṇ tādātmyatadutpattisādhanaviṣayaṃ
SA15arhebt_u:5547: tadanabhyupagame hi hetoḥ sapakṣa eva bhāvaḥ sarveśāṃ hetumatāṃ bhāvānāṃ sādhyenānugamadarśane sati vipakṣe cābhāva eva sādhyavikalānāṃ sarvārthānāṃ
SA15arhebt_u:5550: yata upayāntaraṃ nāsti tena kāraṇena tayor viśiṣṭayor bhāvābhāvayoḥ pratipādanāya niścitaśabdaḥ prayukto lakṣāṇe lakṣaṇakāeṇeti /
SA15arhebt_u:5551: nanu ca bhāvābhāvavacanamātrād eva pramāṇato niścayo labhyate anyathā tayor eva sattā na prasidhyed iti,
SA15arhebt_u:5554: ity anenaiva sapakṣāsapakṣayoḥ [T. 370b.] bhāvābhāvavacanamātreṇa niścitagrahaṇanirapekṣeṇa tayor bhāvābhāvayor yat sādhanaṃ pramāṇaṃ tasya vṛttir yady apy ākṣipyate /
SA15arhebt_u:5555: kathaṃ punar niścitagrahaṇam antareṇa bhāvābhāvavacanamātratas tadvṛtteḥ ākṣepaḥ?
SA15arhebt_u:5556: ity āha -- anyathā yadi tatsādhanapramāṇavṛttir nākṣipyeta,
SA15arhebt_u:5557: [S. 211b.] tadā tayor eva sapakṣavipakṣayor eva bhāvābhāvayor yā sattā svarūpavyavasthā tasyā aprasiddheḥ /
SA15arhebt_u:5559: ity āha -- jñānasya upalabdher yā sattā utpattiḥ tannibandhanatvāj jñeyasya bhāvābhāvalakṣaṇasya sattāvyavasthāyāḥ svarūpavyavasthiteḥ /
SA15arhebt_u:5560: na hy upalambham antareṇa svata evārthāḥ {p. 224.1} sidhyanti, sarvasya sarvasiddhiprasaṅgāt /
SA15arhebt_u:5561: tasmād idam evaṃrūpaṃ naivaṃrūpam iti tadākārajñānodayād eva vyavasthāpyate /
SA15arhebt_u:5562: yata evaṃ tasmāt sarvatra śāstre loke vā jñeyasattāvyavasthaiva niścitagrahaṇaṃ vinā 'pi tatsādhanaṃ
SA15arhebt_u:5564: kiñ ca, parārthatvāc ca śāstrapraṇayanasya tatsādhanapramāṇavṛttir ākṣipyata iti sambandhaḥ /
SA15arhebt_u:5565: kīdṛśaṃ punas tacchāstrapraṇayanaṃ yat parārtharūpatayā svavyavasthāpitajñeyasattāsādhanaṃ pramāṇam ākṣipati?
SA15arhebt_u:5567_0: yadi nāmaivaṃrūpaṃ parārthaṃ śāstrapraṇayanaṃ tathāpi kathaṃ tat sādhanapramāṇavṛttim
SA15arhebt_u:5567_1: ākṣipatīty āha -- tadrūpaṃ tasya liṅgasya trirūpasya rūpaṃ svabhāvaṃ śāstroktaṃ ye
SA15arhebt_u:5568: na teśāṃ tatas trirūpāl liṅgāc chāstroktād vāñcite 'rthe pravṛttir bhavati,
SA15arhebt_u:5570: yata evam iti tasmāt paropalakṣaṇatvād eva pareṣāṃ jñāpakatvād eva pravarttake trirūpaliṅge jñānaṃ siddham iti yady api niścitagrahaṇam atiricyate tathāpi tāv eva
SA15arhebt_u:5571: liṅgasya sapakṣāsapakṣayor bhāvābhāvau viśiṣṭau śastroktau `sapakṣa eva bhāvo 'sapakṣe cābhāva eva` ity evaṃrūpau kecinnaiyāyika prabhṛtayaḥ,
SA15arhebt_u:5572_0: pare darśanādarśanamātreṇa -- ye darśanādarśane pratibandhasādhake na bhavataḥ --
SA15arhebt_u:5572_1: tanmātreṇa vyavasthāpayanti yata eva[770] iti tasmāt teṣāṃ vādināṃ niśedhārtho 'yaṃ
SA15arhebt_u:5573: yadi tu paravipratipattiḥ na syāt tadā naivāsau prayujyeteti /
SA15arhebt_u:5574_0: kim iti punar darśanādarśanābhyāṃ bhāvābhāvaviśayābhyāṃ sapakṣā[sa]pakśayoḥ viśiṣṭau
SA15arhebt_u:5574_1: bhāvābhāvāv anvayavyatirekātmakau [T. 371b.] neṣyeta ity āha -- sator api ityādi
SA15arhebt_u:5574_2: saty api kvacit sapakṣe bhāvadarśane hetoḥ kvacic cāsapakṣe 'bhāvadarśane `sa śyamaḥ,
SA15arhebt_u:5576: tathā hi -- anvayo nāma sarvatra saty eva sādhye hetor {p. 225.1} bhāvo vyāptyā cāsati sādhye hetor abhāvo vyatirekaḥ /
SA15arhebt_u:5577: na ca kvacit sati sādhye [S. 212b.] hetor bhāvadarśane 'pi tanmātreṇa tathābhāvaḥ sarvatra bhavati,
SA15arhebt_u:5579: tathā kvacit sādhyābhimatasyābhāve saty abhāvadarśane 'pi hetoḥ sarvatra tadabhāve 'vaśyam abhāvaḥ,
SA15arhebt_u:5581: tasmāt pratibandhaprasādhakapramāṇavṛttyaiva yathoktau sapakṣāsapakṣayoḥ bhāvābhāvau sidhyataḥ nānyatheti vipratipattinirāsārtham eva niścitagrahaṇaṃ
SA15arhebt_u:5582: kṛtam ity upadarśayann āha -- tasmāt ityādi /
SA15arhebt_u:5583: asmābhiḥ ityācāryakṛte niścitagrahaṇe 'nyatrāsmākam abhimatatvāt asmābhiḥ ity āha /
SA15arhebt_u:5585: asatyāṃ tu vipratipattau tan na kartavyam eveti pratipādya ata eva nyāyāt jñātatvaṃ rūpāntaraṃ na bhāvatīti [T. 372a.] darśayann āha -- yato 'pi ityādi /
SA15arhebt_u:5588: tenaiva trairūpyavacanenaiva tatsādhanapramāṇākṣepataḥ avagatatvāt pratipannatvād iti /
SA15arhebt_u:5590: yathā pakṣadharmatvavacanenaiva hetor upanayasyārtho 'vagatas tasya dharmiṇi hetoḥ sadbhāvapradarśanātmakatvāt,
SA15arhebt_u:5591: pakṣadharmavacanasya ca tadrūpatvāt tataḥ pṛthagupanayo [S. 213a.] rūpāntaraṃ na bhavati;
SA15arhebt_u:5594: atra paro 'niṣṭam āpādayann āha -- anvayavyatirekayor api ityādi /
SA15arhebt_u:5595: yadi trairūpyavacanenaiva sāmarthyāj jñānaṃ labhyata iti tat tataḥ pṛthag na vaktavyam hanta tarhi anvayāt pṛthag vyatireko na vaktavyaḥ vyatirekāc ca pṛthaganvayaḥ /
SA15arhebt_u:5597: ekasyānvayasya vyatirekasya vā prayogād ubhayasya gateḥ /
SA15arhebt_u:5599: tathā jñātatvasyāpi trairūpyād gamyamānasyāpi pṛthagvacanaṃ karttavyam iti /
SA15arhebt_u:5602: tathā hi -- anvayo hetoḥ {p. 226.1} sapakṣe bhāva ucyate, vyatirekaḥ punar abhāvo 'sapakṣe /
SA15arhebt_u:5603: na ca tau parasparam ākṣipataḥ [T. 372b.] parasparam antarbhavato vidhipratiṣedharūpayor bhinnasvabhāvatvāt /
SA15arhebt_u:5604: na ca yo yato bhinnasvabhāvaḥ sa tatrāntarbhūto yuktaḥ /
SA15arhebt_u:5605: nanu ca yady anvayavyatirekayor bhinnarūpatā kathaṃ tarhi trairūpaṃ liṅgam ucyate? /
SA15arhebt_u:5606: na hi parasparabhinnāv ātmānāv evāsya yujyate, svabhāvabhedalakṣaṇatvād vastubhedasya /
SA15arhebt_u:5607: naiṣa doṣaḥ, yato yathā 'nvayavyatirekau [S. 213b.] vyavasthāpyete na vā nayo(-pyete tathā tayo)
SA15arhebt_u:5612: vyāvṛttibhede 'pi ca paramārthato bhedo nāstīty ekaṃ liṅgaṃ trirūpam ity ucyata iti /
SA15arhebt_u:5613: kathaṃ tarhi prāguktam[771]`nānayor arthaḥ kaścid bhedaḥ, anyatra prayogabhedād` iti?
SA15arhebt_u:5615: anvayamukhena vyatirekamukheṇa vā prayuktam ekaṃ vākyam ubhayam anvayaṃ vyatirekaṃ ca bhinnalakṣaṇam eva gamayatīty ucyate 'smābhir naiko 'rthaḥ svabhāvo dvitīyasyocyate,
SA15arhebt_u:5617: atra para āha -- natu(nu) tatraiva ityādi /
SA15arhebt_u:5618: ayam abhiprāyaḥ -- lakṣaṇavākyapratipāditāv anvayavyatirekāv āśritya parasparāntarbhāvaścodyate /
SA15arhebt_u:5620: tathā hi -- `tatraiva bhāvaḥ` ity atra lakṣaṇavākye tadarthatayā[773]tadabhāve 'bhāvo gamyate;
SA15arhebt_u:5623: pratibandhaś ca tādātmyatadutpattibhyāṃ tadbhāve bhāvarūpa eva /
SA15arhebt_u:5624: tataś caikenaiva sapakṣāsapakṣyor bhāvābhāvapratipādakena [S. 214a.] prativiśiṣṭena lakṣaṇavākyenobhayagater dvitīyavacanaṃ na karttavyam iti /
SA15arhebt_u:5626: tataś ca yaduktam `anvayavyatirekayor api tarhi na pṛthaktvam iti` tat tadavastham eveti /
SA15arhebt_u:5627: {p. 227.1} siddhāntavādy āha -- vacanam etad `tatraiva bhāvaḥ` ityādirūpam ubhayamākṣipati pratipādayati /
SA15arhebt_u:5630: niyamas vyāpakasya `sapakṣa eva bhāvo 'sapakṣe cābhāva eva` iti sāvadhāraṇasya dvitīyākṣepanāntarīyakatvāt dvitīyapratipādananāntarīyakatvāt /
SA15arhebt_u:5631: na ca tāvataikavākyapratipādanamātreṇobhayor ekasvabhāvatā bhinnasvabhāvānām apy athānām ekavākyena pratipādanāt /
SA15arhebt_u:5632: ekenaiva ca lakṣaṇavākyenobhayagatāv api yat pṛthaabhidhānaṃ tat prayoganiyamārtham /
SA15arhebt_u:5635: vaidharmyaprayoge ca sādharmyavacanam iti na punar ekābhidhānenānavagatasya rūpāntarasya pratipādanārtham /
SA15arhebt_u:5636: na ca tathā trairūpyavacanena jñānanibandhanena jñeyasattāvyavasthāyāḥ paropalakṣaṇāthena ca śāstrapraṇayanenāśritajñānasyaiva trairūpyasya [S. 214b.] pratipādanāl
SA15arhebt_u:5637: labdhasya jñānasya punarvacane na kiñcit prayojanam astīti nāsya pṛthagvacanaṃ yuktam iti /
SA15arhebt_u:5638_0: syānmatam -- kevalāv api tarhy ekavākyārthānantarbhūtau parasparama'bhinnasvabhāvau
SA15arhebt_u:5638_1: bhaviṣyataḥ tata evaikavākyārthāntarbhāvād ity ata āha -- na punaḥkevalau ekavākyārthānapekṣau
SA15arhebt_u:5639: nanu ca niyamavantāv api bhāvābhāvau kevalāv eva,
SA15arhebt_u:5640: tayoḥ parasparākṣepe kevalayor api tatprasaṅga ity ata āha -- niyamavantau ca sāvadhāraṇavākyapratipāditau na kevalau kintu sahitāv eva /
SA15arhebt_u:5643: tad evaṃ sāvadharaṇena [T. 374a.] vākyena naiva kevalo 'nvayo vyatireko vā 'bhidhīyate /
SA15arhebt_u:5644_0: tadantarbhāvāt tu dvitīyagatiḥ kintu parasparānantarbhūtāv eva sahitāv ekena vākyenābhidhīyeta
SA15arhebt_u:5644_1: iti pratipādyopasaṃharann āha -- tasmāt tatraiva [S. 215a.] sapakṣa eva bhāva {p.
SA15arhebt_u:5644_2: 228.1} ity anena vākyena na sapakṣe bhāva evocyate /
SA15arhebt_u:5647: tathā cetareṇāpy asapakṣe 'bhāva eveti vacanena nābhāva eva kevala ucyate kintu sapakṣe bhāvo 'pi,
SA15arhebt_u:5648: yena kevalavacanena bhāvo 'bhāvo vā tadātmakatayā dvitīyam ākṣiped yato 'nayoḥ pṛthagvacanaṃ na syāt /
SA15arhebt_u:5649: tasmād yadā 'nvayavyatirekau bhāvābhāvāv abhipretau tadā tau bhinnarūpāv eveti kathaṃ tayoḥ na pṛthaktvam? /
SA15arhebt_u:5650: atha niyamavatā vākyenābhihitau tadaikavākyād evobhayagateḥ pṛthagvacanaṃ na karttavyam eva /
SA15arhebt_u:5651: tat tu kṛtaṃ nāpratipannapratipattaye kintu prayoganiyamārtham ity uktam etad iti /
SA15arhebt_u:5652: syānmatam -- yathā 'nvayavyatirekau bhāvābhāvalakṣaṇau na parasparātmakau tataś ca tayoḥ parasparato rūpāntaratvam,
SA15arhebt_u:5653: evaṃ paropalakṣaṇaśastrapratipāditāt trailakṣaṇyād bhidyata eva jñānam,
SA15arhebt_u:5655: tato rūpāntaraṃ bhaviṣyatīty ata [T. 374b.] āha -- naivam,
SA15arhebt_u:5660: trairūpyaviṣayāṃ pratītiṃ kāryante yena śāstreṇa tato yat trailakṣaṇyaṃ pratīyate āgṛhītajñānaṃ tasmād avyatirekād āgṛhītajñāne trailakṣaṇye 'ntarbhāvād iti yāvat,
SA15arhebt_u:5661: iti tasmān na lakṣaṇāntaraṃ trairūpyād iti /
SA15arhebt_u:5662: tad ayam atra samudāyārthaḥ -- yadi jñātatvaṃ jñānaśabdapravṛttinimittaṃ uktena prakāreṇa jñānam evocyate tadā talliṃgasyānātmabhūtam iti
SA15arhebt_u:5665: jñānāpekṣaḥ karmabhāvo jñātatvam ucyate tadā 'pi jñeyasattāvyavasthāyā jñānasattānibandhanatvāt trairūpyavyavasthaiva tatsattāvyavasthāpakaṃ jñānam ākṣipati /
SA15arhebt_u:5666: tatas tadapekṣo 'pi karmabhāvo 'nuktasiddha iti na tadvacanaṃ pṛthakkarttavyam /
SA15arhebt_u:5668: tad evam abādhitaviṣayatvādikaṃ rūpatrayaṃ nirākṛtya nigamayann āha -- tasmān na hetuḥṣaḍlakṣaṇaḥ/
SA15arhebt_u:5676_1: mā yatata imā yā tadrūpā bala (?)
SA15arhebt_u:5680: na guror upadeśam agrahīt bubudhe vastu tato ... ... dhīḥ /
SA15arhebt_u:5681: yatato sma na tasya vṛddhaye na parispanditum apy apārayat // [1 //]
SA15arhebt_u:5682: jīvātmakaṃ cāndramasaṃ ca tejaḥ kṛtāspadaṃ tasya tai ...t /
